quote: Great achievement is usually born of great sacrifice, and is never the result of selfishness.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Behind every great fortune lies a great crime.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and some have greatness thrust upon them.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Greatness lies, not in being strong, but in the right using of strength; and strength is not used rightly when it serves only to carry a man above his fellows for his own solitary glory. He is the greatest whose strength carries up the most hearts by the attraction of his own.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: To achieve great things, two things are needed; a plan, and not quite enough time.
author: Leonard Bernstein

quote: Nothing great in the world has ever been accomplished without passion.
author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Good health and good sense are two of life's greatest blessings.
author: Publilius Syrus

quote: The greater the obstacle, the more glory in overcoming it.
author: Moliere

quote: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: The principles of living greatly include the capacity to face trouble with courage, disappointment with cheerfulness, and trial with humility.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: The heights by great men reached and kept were not attained by sudden flight, but they, while their companions slept, were toiling upward in the night.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: Small opportunities are often the beginning of great enterprises.
author: Demosthenes

quote: To become truly great, one has to stand with people, not above them.
author: Montesquieu

quote: The greatest weapon against stress is our ability to choose one thought over another.
author: William James

quote: There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: The mediocre teacher tells. The good teacher explains. The superior teacher demonstrates. The great teacher inspires.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly.
author: Robert Kennedy

quote: If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Lives of great men all remind us, we can make our lives sublime, and, departing, leave behind us, footprints on the sands of time.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: Believe deep down in your heart that you're destined to do great things.
author: Joe Paterno

quote: Life should be great rather than long.
author: B. R. Ambedkar

quote: The greatest mistake you can make in life is continually fearing that you'll make one.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: What wisdom can you find that is greater than kindness?
author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: The greatness of a nation can be judged by the way its animals are treated.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: I am the greatest, I said that even before I knew I was.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Little minds are tamed and subdued by misfortune; but great minds rise above them.
author: Washington Irving

quote: Don't be humble... you're not that great.
author: Golda Meir

quote: Great people talk about ideas, average people talk about things, and small people talk about wine.
author: Fran Lebowitz

quote: You need a little bit of insanity to do great things.
author: Henry Rollins

quote: To do a great right do a little wrong.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: The greater the artist, the greater the doubt. Perfect confidence is granted to the less talented as a consolation prize.
author: Robert Hughes

quote: The greatest good you can do for another is not just to share your riches but to reveal to him his own.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Great things are not accomplished by those who yield to trends and fads and popular opinion.
author: Jack Kerouac

quote: The greater the effort, the greater the glory.
author: Pierre Corneille

quote: We are all faced with a series of great opportunities brilliantly disguised as impossible situations.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: After climbing a great hill, one only finds that there are many more hills to climb.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: It is a rough road that leads to the heights of greatness.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: The great man is he who does not lose his child's-heart.
author: Mencius

quote: There is no greatness where there is no simplicity, goodness and truth.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: One sees great things from the valley; only small things from the peak.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: It's hard to be humble, when you're as great as I am.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Great things are done by a series of small things brought together.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: The first and greatest victory is to conquer yourself; to be conquered by yourself is of all things most shameful and vile.
author: Plato

quote: Could a greater miracle take place than for us to look through each other's eyes for an instant?
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: The greatest discovery of all time is that a person can change his future by merely changing his attitude.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: All great achievements require time.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: All the great things are simple, and many can be expressed in a single word: freedom, justice, honor, duty, mercy, hope.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Great things are done when men and mountains meet.
author: William Blake

quote: Our greatest glory is not in never failing, but in rising up every time we fail.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Only passions, great passions can elevate the soul to great things.
author: Denis Diderot

quote: I firmly believe that any man's finest hour, the greatest fulfillment of all that he holds dear, is that moment when he has worked his heart out in a good cause and lies exhausted on the field of battle - victorious.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: All truly great thoughts are conceived by walking.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The greatest wealth is to live content with little.
author: Plato

quote: You are your greatest asset. Put your time, effort and money into training, grooming, and encouraging your greatest asset.
author: Tom Hopkins

quote: See everything, overlook a great deal, correct a little.
author: Pope John XXIII

quote: Those who dare to fail miserably can achieve greatly.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Great spirits have always encountered violent opposition from mediocre minds.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: I've got a great ambition to die of exhaustion rather than boredom.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: The great question that has never been answered, and which I have not yet been able to answer, despite my thirty years of research into the feminine soul, is 'What does a woman want?'
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: A man is great by deeds, not by birth.
author: Chanakya

quote: As a child of God, I am greater than anything that can happen to me.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Heaven and hell suppose two distinct species of men, the good and the bad. But the greatest part of mankind float betwixt vice and virtue.
author: David Hume

quote: Great things are won by great dangers.
author: Herodotus

quote: A great pleasure in life is doing what people say you cannot do.
author: Walter Bagehot

quote: The greatest accomplishment is not in never falling, but in rising again after you fall.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Good artists copy, great artists steal.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: The greatest happiness is to know the source of unhappiness.
author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quote: Whatever you want to do, if you want to be great at it, you have to love it and be able to make sacrifices for it.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: For the person for whom small things do not exist, the great is not great.
author: Jose Ortega y Gasset

quote: Just do what must be done. This may not be happiness, but it is greatness.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: The price of greatness is responsibility.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Great minds are to make others great. Their superiority is to be used, not to break the multitude to intellectual vassalage, not to establish over them a spiritual tyranny, but to rouse them from lethargy, and to aid them to judge for themselves.
author: William Ellery Channing

quote: A great man is different from an eminent one in that he is ready to be the servant of the society.
author: B. R. Ambedkar

quote: That some achieve great success, is proof to all that others can achieve it as well.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: I long to accomplish a great and noble task, but it is my chief duty to accomplish small tasks as if they were great and noble.
author: Helen Keller

quote: I have learned to use the word 'impossible' with the greatest caution.
author: Wernher von Braun

quote: There is no such thing as a great talent without great will power.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: The greatest mistake we make is living in constant fear that we will make one.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Life is either a great adventure or nothing.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Never was anything great achieved without danger.
author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quote: I believe the first test of a truly great man is in his humility.
author: John Ruskin

quote: The greatest way to live with honor in this world is to be what we pretend to be.
author: Socrates

quote: Most great people have attained their greatest success just one step beyond their greatest failure.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Great thoughts speak only to the thoughtful mind, but great actions speak to all mankind.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: To be great is to be misunderstood.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Character may be manifested in the great moments, but it is made in the small ones.
author: Phillips Brooks

quote: Trust men and they will be true to you; treat them greatly and they will show themselves great.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The greater the difficulty, the more the glory in surmounting it.
author: Charles de Saint-Évremond

quote: Do you wish to be great? Then begin by being. Do you desire to construct a vast and lofty fabric? Think first about the foundations of humility. The higher your structure is to be, the deeper must be its foundation.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: Every great work, every big accomplishment, has been brought into manifestation through holding to the vision, and often just before the big achievement, comes apparent failure and discouragement.
author: Florence Scovel Shinn

quote: Be great in act, as you have been in thought.
author: Jean Paul

quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good for the great.
author: Kenny Rogers

quote: A man's worth is no greater than his ambitions.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Seek not greatness, but seek truth and you will find both.
author: Horace Mann

quote: Whatever I have tried to do in life, I have tried with all my heart to do it well; whatever I have devoted myself to, I have devoted myself completely; in great aims and in small I have always thoroughly been in earnest.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: The final proof of greatness lies in being able to endure criticism without resentment.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: The demand to be loved is the greatest of all arrogant presumptions.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: I think what motivates people is not great hate, but great love for other people.
author: Huey Newton

quote: Great acts are made up of small deeds.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: He who would accomplish little must sacrifice little; he who would achieve much must sacrifice much; he who would attain highly must sacrifice greatly.
author: James Allen

quote: One of the greatest diseases is to be nobody to anybody.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Laws control the lesser man... Right conduct controls the greater one.
author: Mark Twain

quote: To have great poets, there must be great audiences.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: We grow small trying to be great.
author: E. Stanley Jones

quote: Great wisdom is generous; petty wisdom is contentious. Great speech is impassioned, small speech cantankerous.
author: Zhuangzi

quote: To be really great in little things, to be truly noble and heroic in the insipid details of everyday life, is a virtue so rare as to be worthy of canonization.
author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quote: It is the nature of all greatness not to be exact.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: And what he greatly thought, he nobly dared.
author: Homer

quote: Because of a great love, one is courageous.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Great men are seldom over-scrupulous in the arrangement of their attire.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: Life in abundance comes only through great love.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: The world's great men have not commonly been great scholars, nor its great scholars great men.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: A retentive memory may be a good thing, but the ability to forget is the true token of greatness.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Great talents are the most lovely and often the most dangerous fruits on the tree of humanity. They hang upon the most slender twigs that are easily snapped off.
author: Carl Jung

quote: There is no personal charm so great as the charm of a cheerful temperament.
author: Henry Van Dyke

quote: There would be no great men if there were no little ones.
author: George Herbert

quote: And the American people are the greatest people in the world. What makes America the greatest nation in the world is the heart of the American people: hardworking, innovative, risk-taking, God- loving, family-oriented American people.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: Believe that with your feelings and your work you are taking part in the greatest; the more strongly you cultivate this belief, the more will reality and the world go forth from it.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: The appearance of a single great genius is more than equivalent to the birth of a hundred mediocrities.
author: Cesare Lombroso

quote: A mistake made by many people with great convictions is that they will let nothing stand in the way of their views, not even kindness.
author: Bryant H. McGill

quote: The most characteristic mark of a great mind is to choose some one important object, and pursue it for life.
author: Anna Letitia Barbauld

quote: The most important thing is to try and inspire people so that they can be great in whatever they want to do.
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream; not only plan, but also believe.
author: Anatole France

quote: Great works are performed not by strength but by perseverance.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: We live in a fantasy world, a world of illusion. The great task in life is to find reality.
author: Iris Murdoch

quote: Behind every great man is a woman rolling her eyes.
author: Jim Carrey

quote: Where words are restrained, the eyes often talk a great deal.
author: Samuel Richardson

quote: In times of great stress or adversity, it's always best to keep busy, to plow your anger and your energy into something positive.
author: Lee Iacocca

quote: There are two great days in a person's life - the day we are born and the day we discover why.
author: William Barclay

quote: Rice is great if you're really hungry and want to eat two thousand of something.
author: Mitch Hedberg

quote: A certain amount of opposition is a great help to a man. Kites rise against, not with, the wind.
author: Lewis Mumford

quote: Character contributes to beauty. It fortifies a woman as her youth fades. A mode of conduct, a standard of courage, discipline, fortitude, and integrity can do a great deal to make a woman beautiful.
author: Jacqueline Bisset

quote: It has been great journey from where I have started to where I am today. I am really blessed with God's grace.
author: Dhanush

quote: The great aim of education is not knowledge but action.
author: Herbert Spencer

quote: A great civilization is not conquered from without until it has destroyed itself from within.
author: Ariel Durant

quote: It's great to reminisce about good memories of my past. It was enjoyable when it was today. So learning to enjoy today has two benefits: it gives me happiness right now, and it becomes a good memory later.
author: George Foreman

quote: I've learned that fear limits you and your vision. It serves as blinders to what may be just a few steps down the road for you. The journey is valuable, but believing in your talents, your abilities, and your self-worth can empower you to walk down an even brighter path. Transforming fear into freedom - how great is that?
author: Soledad O'Brien

quote: I have come to believe that a great teacher is a great artist and that there are as few as there are any other great artists. Teaching might even be the greatest of the arts since the medium is the human mind and spirit.
author: John Steinbeck

quote: Simply enjoy life and the great pleasures that come with it.
author: Karolina Kurkova

quote: Never stop fighting until you arrive at your destined place - that is, the unique you. Have an aim in life, continuously acquire knowledge, work hard, and have perseverance to realise the great life.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: No man will make a great leader who wants to do it all himself or get all the credit for doing it.
author: Andrew Carnegie

quote: An animal's eyes have the power to speak a great language.
author: Martin Buber

quote: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: In order to have great happiness you have to have great pain and unhappiness - otherwise how would you know when you're happy?
author: Leslie Caron

quote: I love a man with a great sense of humor and who is intelligent - a man who has a great smile. He has to make me laugh. I like a man who is very ambitious and driven and who has a good heart and makes me feel safe. I like a man who is very strong and independent and confident - that is very sexy - but at the same time, he's very kind to people.
author: Nicole Scherzinger

quote: The media transforms the great silence of things into its opposite. Formerly constituting a secret, the real now talks constantly. News reports, information, statistics, and surveys are everywhere.
author: Michel De Certeau

quote: I have great respect for the past. If you don't know where you've come from, you don't know where you're going. I have respect for the past, but I'm a person of the moment. I'm here, and I do my best to be completely centered at the place I'm at, then I go forward to the next place.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: I do not know what I may appear to the world, but to myself I seem to have been only like a boy playing on the seashore, and diverting myself in now and then finding a smoother pebble or a prettier shell than ordinary, whilst the great ocean of truth lay all undiscovered before me.
author: Isaac Newton

quote: The great thing about social media was how it gave a voice to voiceless people.
author: Jon Ronson

quote: I have never killed a man, but I have read many obituaries with great pleasure.
author: Clarence Darrow

quote: I've been so lucky to work with such great people: people that are such hard workers and have such a respect and appreciation for one another.
author: Blake Lively

quote: Harmony makes small things grow, lack of it makes great things decay.
author: Sallust

quote: Singing is my passion, my first love and the secret of my energy. Music to me is like finding my inner self, my soul. It gives me a great joy to see audiences enjoying with me. I have given my heart to singing. When I sing, I can feel romance in everything around me.
author: Kailash Kher

quote: We all have a dark side. Most of us go through life avoiding direct confrontation with that aspect of ourselves, which I call the shadow self. There's a reason why. It carries a great deal of energy.
author: Lorraine Toussaint

quote: A leader takes people where they want to go. A great leader takes people where they don't necessarily want to go, but ought to be.
author: Rosalynn Carter

quote: We can have democracy in this country, or we can have great wealth concentrated in the hands of a few, but we can't have both.
author: Louis D. Brandeis

quote: Every day, my daddy told me the same thing. 'Once a task is just begun, never leave it till it's done. Be the labour great or small, do it well or not at all.'
author: Quincy Jones

quote: Sometimes I wish that I could go into a time machine right now and just look at my self and say, 'Calm down. Things are gonna be fine. Things are gonna be all great. Just relax.'
author: Tristan Wilds

quote: Failure is a great teacher, and I think when you make mistakes and you recover from them and you treat them as valuable learning experiences, then you've got something to share.
author: Steve Harvey

quote: If I could talk to my younger self, I would just say that the path to great things is filled with a lot of stumbles, suffering, and challenges along the way. But if you have the right attitude and know that hard times will pass - and you get up each time - you will reach your destination.
author: Jonny Kim

quote: You can't build a great building on a weak foundation. You must have a solid foundation if you're going to have a strong superstructure.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: The internet is a great way to get on the net.
author: Bob Dole

quote: Do the difficult things while they are easy and do the great things while they are small. A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: There is strength in numbers, but organizing those numbers is one of the great challenges.
author: John C. Mather

quote: We hang the petty thieves and appoint the great ones to public office.
author: Aesop

quote: If it wasn't hard, everyone would do it. It's the hard that makes it great.
author: Tom Hanks

quote: There must be a beginning of any great matter, but the continuing unto the end until it be thoroughly finished yields the true glory.
author: Francis Drake

quote: Today's a beautiful day, and yesterday was a beautiful day, so that means it's a great life.
author: Gnash

quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: First, accept sadness. Realize that without losing, winning isn't so great.
author: Alyssa Milano

quote: Time is a great teacher, but unfortunately it kills all its pupils.
author: Hector Berlioz

quote: Life is a great big canvas; throw all the paint you can at it.
author: Danny Kaye

quote: I am a firm believer in the people. If given the truth, they can be depended upon to meet any national crisis. The great point is to bring them the real facts.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Absence is to love what wind is to fire; it extinguishes the small, it enkindles the great.
author: Roger de Rabutin

quote: To my young friends out there: Life can be great, but not when you can't see it. So, open your eyes to life: to see it in the vivid colors that God gave us as a precious gift to His children, to enjoy life to the fullest, and to make it count. Say yes to your life.
author: Nancy Reagan

quote: Politics is dirty. Politics is exciting. Politics is often very, very difficult and disappointing. And I really would rather the world would be a little more like it was when my dad was young, where you knew pretty much where people stood on the great moral issues.
author: James Dobson

quote: You're never too old to start learning, and you're never too young to aim high and achieve great things.
author: Asa Hutchinson

quote: There is no medicine like hope, no incentive so great, and no tonic so powerful as expectation of something better tomorrow.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends.
author: J. K. Rowling

quote: Only great minds can afford a simple style.
author: Stendhal

quote: I'd rather attempt to do something great and fail than to attempt to do nothing and succeed.
author: Robert H. Schuller

quote: I don't know of any great man who ever had a great son.
author: Anthony Mann

quote: I surround myself with good people who make me feel great and give me positive energy.
author: Ali Krieger

quote: The true revolutionary is guided by a great feeling of love. It is impossible to think of a genuine revolutionary lacking this quality.
author: Che Guevara

quote: Passion is one great force that unleashes creativity, because if you're passionate about something, then you're more willing to take risks.
author: Yo-Yo Ma

quote: I get up every morning and it's going to be a great day. You never know when it's going to be over so I refuse to have a bad day.
author: Paul Henderson

quote: I am blessed to have so many great things in my life - family, friends and God. All will be in my thoughts daily.
author: Lil' Kim

quote: I'm proud of my hard work. Working hard won't always lead to the exact things we desire. There are many things I've wanted that I haven't always gotten. But, I have a great satisfaction in the blessings from my mother and father, who instilled a great work ethic in me both personally and professionally.
author: Tamron Hall

quote: Great literature is simply language charged with meaning to the utmost possible degree.
author: Ezra Pound

quote: A great accomplishment shouldn't be the end of the road, just the starting point for the next leap forward.
author: Harvey Mackay

quote: Great leaders are willing to sacrifice the numbers to save the people. Poor leaders sacrifice the people to save the numbers.
author: Simon Sinek

quote: I am a great believer in luck, and I find the harder I work the more I have of it.
author: Stephen Leacock

quote: To become a great player, you've got to show real dedication and commitment to football, and you've got to be very humble and hard-working. And, above all, you've got to fight to make your dreams come true.
author: Sergio Ramos

quote: Cooking is not difficult. Everyone has taste, even if they don't realize it. Even if you're not a great chef, there's nothing to stop you understanding the difference between what tastes good and what doesn't.
author: Gerard Depardieu

quote: Great things in business are never done by one person. They're done by a team of people.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Confidence is the most important single factor in this game, and no matter how great your natural talent, there is only one way to obtain and sustain it: work.
author: Jack Nicklaus

quote: To me, there's no great chef without a great team.
author: Daniel Boulud

quote: Technology... is a queer thing. It brings you great gifts with one hand, and it stabs you in the back with the other.
author: Carrie Snow

quote: A great figure or physique is nice, but it's self-confidence that makes someone really sexy.
author: Vivica A. Fox

quote: Great work is done by people who are not afraid to be great.
author: Fernando Flores

quote: I think we all have our own personality, unique and distinctive, and at the same time, I think that our own unique and distinctive personality blends with the wind, with the footsteps in the street, with the noises around the corner, and with the silence of memory, which is the great producer of ghosts.
author: Octavio Paz

quote: He who learns but does not think, is lost! He who thinks but does not learn is in great danger.
author: Confucius

quote: Hate is too great a burden to bear. It injures the hater more than it injures the hated.
author: Coretta Scott King

quote: There are great legends and great fighters in the history of Mexico, and there will be more to come.
author: Canelo Alvarez

quote: To be one, to be united is a great thing. But to respect the right to be different is maybe even greater.
author: Bono

quote: Every great story seems to begin with a snake.
author: Nicolas Cage

quote: I have decided to stick with love. Hate is too great a burden to bear.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Fereydun, that's my dad's name. My grandmother, my dad's mom, when she was pregnant, she was dating a man from Persia, a Persian gentleman. It wasn't his child, but he was still very supportive and said, 'Hey, this is a great name,' and so it stuck. So that's what she named him.
author: Fred Armisen

quote: Experience is a great teacher.
author: John Legend

quote: Great thoughts come from the heart.
author: Luc de Clapiers

quote: One of the best ways to make yourself happy in the present is to recall happy times from the past. Photos are a great memory-prompt, and because we tend to take photos of happy occasions, they weight our memories to the good.
author: Gretchen Rubin

quote: To live alone is the fate of all great souls.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: Good design is making something intelligible and memorable. Great design is making something memorable and meaningful.
author: Dieter Rams

quote: The city is like a great house, and the house in its turn a small city.
author: Leon Battista Alberti

quote: It sounds simple telling people to work hard and never quit, but to really execute and demonstrate those principles takes discipline and faith. Those are the two factors that I believe separate the good from the great, the successes from the failures.
author: Nipsey Hussle

quote: Waiting is the great vocation of the dispossessed.
author: Mary Gordon

quote: I tell a student that the most important class you can take is technique. A great chef is first a great technician. 'If you are a jeweler, or a surgeon or a cook, you have to know the trade in your hand. You have to learn the process. You learn it through endless repetition until it belongs to you.
author: Jacques Pepin

quote: The great tragedy of science - the slaying of a beautiful hypothesis by an ugly fact.
author: Thomas Huxley

quote: People always tell you, 'Be humble. Be humble.' When was the last time someone told you to be amazing? Be great! Be great! Be awesome! Be awesome!
author: Kanye West

quote: Nothing great was ever achieved without enthusiasm.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: By people getting together and celebrating this idea of togetherness, great things can happen.
author: Edward Enninful

quote: Australia is a nation of compassion. Courage and compassion. And the third of these great values: resilience.
author: Kevin Rudd

quote: A dream is the bearer of a new possibility, the enlarged horizon, the great hope.
author: Howard Thurman

quote: The one question I would have for Donald Trump is inspired by his 'Make America Great Again' cap. I would ask him, 'When was America great? When did America not have an economic depression or a war?'
author: Tech N9ne

quote: Education then, beyond all other devices of human origin, is the great equalizer of the conditions of men, the balance-wheel of the social machinery.
author: Horace Mann

quote: A great chef is an artist that I truly respect.
author: Robert Stack

quote: I will remember this day for the rest of my life. There is nothing you can say. It's just like you won the match after the earthquake and it just feels great.
author: Elena Vesnina

quote: It's a great day for a ball game; let's play two!
author: Ernie Banks

quote: Nothing beats a great smile.
author: Karl Urban

quote: It's good to be happy and tell us how cool your life is and how awesome you are on social media. That's great because it inspires other people to be happy, too. But a lot of times, people are trying to be happy in the wrong ways - with money or with different things that are not true happiness.
author: Jaden Smith

quote: It's great to be a blonde. With low expectations it's very easy to surprise people.
author: Pamela Anderson

quote: Everything has become so easy. It's great that it's at your fingertips, but I miss those good old days. And we're connected, but it can be very alienating. There is this distance between all of us because we're speaking to each other through cameras and monitors and icons and Emojis.
author: Rami Malek

quote: Everything is a learning lesson, good and bad, so I am happy with the way things are, and I learned from everything negative. I am in a great space now, so I wouldn't change a thing!
author: Karen Civil

quote: People who think they know everything are a great annoyance to those of us who do.
author: Isaac Asimov

quote: It's a great feeling when your work is appreciated.
author: Jacqueline Fernandez

quote: Don't wait for extraordinary opportunities. Seize common occasions and make them great. Weak men wait for opportunities; strong men make them.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: Today we thank God for all the blessings He has bestowed upon this great Country and ask Him to continue to heal our land and meet our needs - and we do so through the power of prayer.
author: Nick Rahall

quote: To free us from the expectations of others, to give us back to ourselves - there lies the great, singular power of self-respect.
author: Joan Didion

quote: I love going to the beach and swimming in the ocean. I think it's so relaxing. It's also a great form of active recovery. It's perfect for those rest days when you still want to move a little bit.
author: Eugenie Bouchard

quote: I'm so lucky to have such a great family. I respect them so much professionally, and they've been unconditionally supportive in the choices that I've made. It's been very good having them on my side.
author: Jack Huston

quote: Pray that your loneliness may spur you into finding something to live for, great enough to die for.
author: Dag Hammarskjold

quote: Rarely do great beauty and great virtue dwell together.
author: Petrarch

quote: I know I'm not a great singer. But I love to sing and I like to use my voice in different ways.
author: Melanie Chisholm

quote: How great it would be for us all to have the pride of knowing that we, as a country, are one of the best countries to be a child.
author: Jacinda Ardern

quote: There is no pain so great as the memory of joy in present grief.
author: Aeschylus

quote: Luck is great, but most of life is hard work.
author: Iain Duncan Smith

quote: Mother Nature is the great equalizer. You can't get away from it.
author: Christopher Heyerdahl

quote: The harder the struggle, the more glorious the triumph. Self-realization demands very great struggle.
author: Swami Sivananda

quote: It's so great to find that one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.
author: Rita Rudner

quote: I think that the good and the great are only separated by the willingness to sacrifice.
author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quote: To survive and even thrive in a changing world, nature offers another great lesson: the survivors are those who at the least adapt to change, or even better learn to benefit from change and grow intellectually and personally. That means careful listening and constant learning.
author: Frances Arnold

quote: On some great and glorious day the plain folks of the land will reach their heart's desire at last, and the White House will be adorned by a downright moron.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: There have been two great accidents in my life. One was the trolley, and the other was Diego. Diego was by far the worst.
author: Frida Kahlo

quote: I'm surrounded by nothing but great people. I've been blessed with that, so really, I've got no choice but to be an all-around good person.
author: Tim Duncan

quote: Absence diminishes mediocre passions and increases great ones, as the wind extinguishes candles and fans fires.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: During the Great Depression, African Americans were faced with problems that were not unlike those experienced by the most disadvantaged groups in society. The Great Depression had a leveling effect, and all groups really experienced hard times: poor whites, poor blacks.
author: William Julius Wilson

quote: Change is never easy, and it often creates discord, but when people come together for the good of humanity and the Earth, we can accomplish great things.
author: David Suzuki

quote: The great gift of human beings is that we have the power of empathy.
author: Meryl Streep

quote: The comfort zone is the great enemy to creativity; moving beyond it necessitates intuition, which in turn configures new perspectives and conquers fears.
author: Dan Stevens

quote: Truth is, I'll never know all there is to know about you just as you will never know all there is to know about me. Humans are by nature too complicated to be understood fully. So, we can choose either to approach our fellow human beings with suspicion or to approach them with an open mind, a dash of optimism and a great deal of candour.
author: Tom Hanks

quote: Small deeds done are better than great deeds planned.
author: Peter Marshall

quote: I really had a lot of dreams when I was a kid, and I think a great deal of that grew out of the fact that I had a chance to read a lot.
author: Bill Gates

quote: My father was my teacher. But most importantly he was a great dad.
author: Beau Bridges

quote: Every great advance in science has issued from a new audacity of imagination.
author: John Dewey

quote: It takes a great deal of history to produce a little literature.
author: Henry James

quote: I love getting anything homemade - anything that's from the heart. If you can make or craft your own something, that always goes above and beyond, like, a candle - which is great, but if it's homemade, that's so much better for me.
author: David Burtka

quote: Winning is great, sure, but if you are really going to do something in life, the secret is learning how to lose. Nobody goes undefeated all the time. If you can pick up after a crushing defeat, and go on to win again, you are going to be a champion someday.
author: Wilma Rudolph

quote: I find the great thing in this world is not so much where we stand, as in what direction we are moving: To reach the port of heaven, we must sail sometimes with the wind and sometimes against it - but we must sail, and not drift, nor lie at anchor.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: Anything you cannot relinquish when it has outlived its usefulness possesses you, and in this materialistic age a great many of us are possessed by our possessions.
author: Peace Pilgrim

quote: Silence is one of the great arts of conversation.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: We struggle with eating healthily, obesity, and access to good nutrition for everyone. But we have a great opportunity to get on the right side of this battle by beginning to think differently about the way that we eat and the way that we approach food.
author: Marcus Samuelsson

quote: Nostalgia is one thing. It's great to go and play the old songs. People know them and appreciate them. You got to give them what they want to hear.
author: Denny Laine

quote: Life is a great sunrise. I do not see why death should not be an even greater one.
author: Vladimir Nabokov

quote: I truly believe in positive synergy, that your positive mindset gives you a more hopeful outlook, and belief that you can do something great means you will do something great.
author: Russell Wilson

quote: Great companies are built on great products.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Wisdom is the right use of knowledge. To know is not to be wise. Many men know a great deal, and are all the greater fools for it. There is no fool so great a fool as a knowing fool. But to know how to use knowledge is to have wisdom.
author: Charles Spurgeon

quote: Clothes are like a good meal, a good movie, great pieces of music.
author: Michael Kors

quote: Life is short, youth is finite, and opportunities endless. Have you found the intersection of your passion and the potential for world-shaping positive impact? If you don't have a great idea of your own, there are plenty of great teams that need you - unknown startups and established teams in giant companies alike.
author: Justin Rosenstein

quote: If you want to become a great chef, you have to work with great chefs. And that's exactly what I did.
author: Gordon Ramsay

quote: As your faith is strengthened you will find that there is no longer the need to have a sense of control, that things will flow as they will, and that you will flow with them, to your great delight and benefit.
author: Emmanuel Teney

quote: It's sad to know I'm done. But looking back, I've got a lot of great memories.
author: Bonnie Blair

quote: The great art of life is sensation, to feel that we exist, even in pain.
author: Lord Byron

quote: It doesn't matter what age you are. You can look sexy and feel great, and that doesn't have to be a gift only for the young. It can be a gift for any age, even the old, whatever that is nowadays.
author: Carol Alt

quote: Small aim is a crime; have great aim.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: A great restaurant is one that just makes you feel like you're not sure whether you went out or you came home and confuses you. If it can do both of those things at the same time, you're hooked.
author: Danny Meyer

quote: I always believed that when you follow your heart or your gut, when you really follow the things that feel great to you, you can never lose, because settling is the worst feeling in the world.
author: Rihanna

quote: It's a great privilege and an honour to have the experiences and opportunities that I do to meet extraordinary Australians right across our country who share a great generosity of spirit.
author: Quentin Bryce

quote: Leadership is hard to define and good leadership even harder. But if you can get people to follow you to the ends of the earth, you are a great leader.
author: Indra Nooyi

quote: A mode of conduct, a standard of courage, discipline, fortitude and integrity can do a great deal to make a woman beautiful.
author: Jacqueline Bisset

quote: A great deal of talent is lost to the world for want of a little courage. Every day sends to their graves obscure men whose timidity prevented them from making a first effort.
author: Sydney Smith

quote: The three great elemental sounds in nature are the sound of rain, the sound of wind in a primeval wood, and the sound of outer ocean on a beach.
author: Henry Beston

quote: I declare before you all that my whole life, whether it be long or short, shall be devoted to your service and the service of our great imperial family to which we all belong.
author: Queen Elizabeth II

quote: Some people hear their own inner voices with great clearness. And they live by what they hear. Such people become crazy... or they become legend.
author: Jim Harrison

quote: Everyone, Republican or otherwise has their own particular part to play. No part is too great or too small, no one is too old or too young to do something.
author: Bobby Sands

quote: The Great Depression of the 1930s saw more American unmarried women working from nine to five, mostly in repetitive, boring, subordinate, dead-end jobs. But the number of working women doubled between 1870 and 1940. During World War II it doubled once again.
author: Helen Fisher

quote: I'm lucky to have a great support system in my friends and some of my family. If you have those people that you trust, go ahead and fall back into them and let them be your hammock and cocoon and let them embrace you.
author: JoJo

quote: If a man can bridge the gap between life and death, if he can live on after he's dead, then maybe he was a great man.
author: James Dean

quote: In the first six to twelve months of a war with the United States and Great Britain I will run wild and win victory upon victory. But then, if the war continues after that, I have no expectation of success.
author: Isoroku Yamamoto

quote: The financial crisis and the Great Recession posed the most significant macroeconomic challenges for the United States in a half-century, leaving behind high unemployment and below-target inflation and calling for highly accommodative monetary policies.
author: Jerome Powell

quote: An unexamined faith is not worth having, for fundamentalism and uncritical certitude entail the rejection of one of the great human gifts: that of free will, of the liberty to make up our own minds based on evidence and tradition and reason.
author: Jon Meacham

quote: It's always better to shock people and change people's expectations than to give them exactly what they think you can do. It's not unexpected for me to be in a comedy film anymore; I'm no longer the underdog in that world. Not that I'm great or good at it or anything, it's just that I've done a bunch of them, so you're not shocked.
author: Jonah Hill

quote: Great people have great values and great ethics.
author: Jeffrey Gitomer

quote: You have the ability to choose which way you want to go. You have to believe great things are going to happen in your life. Do everything you can - prepare, pray and achieve - to make it happen.
author: Ben Carson

quote: Belief in oneself and knowing who you are, I mean, that's the foundation for everything great.
author: Jay-Z

quote: The essence of America - that which really unites us - is not ethnicity, or nationality or religion - it is an idea - and what an idea it is: That you can come from humble circumstances and do great things.
author: Condoleezza Rice

quote: The great gift of Easter is hope - Christian hope which makes us have that confidence in God, in his ultimate triumph, and in his goodness and love, which nothing can shake.
author: Basil Hume

quote: The lure of the distant and the difficult is deceptive. The great opportunity is where you are.
author: John Burroughs

quote: Boredom always precedes a period of great creativity.
author: Robert M. Pirsig

quote: Small minds are concerned with the extraordinary, great minds with the ordinary.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: Software is a great combination between artistry and engineering.
author: Bill Gates

quote: I remember I took a music course in junior year of high school, and some girl brought in 'Teardrops On My Guitar,' and she was like, 'Isn't this song great?' And everyone was like, 'Who's Taylor Swift?' And now, every time I listen to Taylor Swift, I remember that moment.
author: Mitski

quote: The great questions of the day will not be settled by means of speeches and majority decisions but by iron and blood.
author: Otto von Bismarck

quote: Fishing is much more than fish. It is the great occasion when we may return to the fine simplicity of our forefathers.
author: Herbert Hoover

quote: I was given such a great gift. It's a miracle that never stops amazing me and reminding me to give thanks, every day. Having a wife and daughter gives me a lot more purpose. I was much more selfish before, but now I think about what kind of role model I'll be. I just want to be a better man.
author: Jake Owen

quote: The United Nations is our one great hope for a peaceful and free world.
author: Ralph Bunche

quote: Living is no laughing matter: you must live with great seriousness like a squirrel for example - I mean without looking for something beyond and above living, I mean living must be your whole occupation.
author: Nazim Hikmet

quote: This is the price you pay for having a great father. You get the wonder, the joy, the tender moments - and you get the tears at the end, too.
author: Harlan Coben

quote: Coffee and smoking are the last great addictions.
author: Lara Flynn Boyle

quote: The world has never yet seen a truly great and virtuous nation because in the degradation of woman the very fountains of life are poisoned at their source.
author: Lucretia Mott

quote: The great thing about getting older is that you don't lose all the other ages you've been.
author: Madeleine L'Engle

quote: I consider myself extremely lucky to have worked with so many great collaborators in my lifetime.
author: Trey Anastasio

quote: And so while the great ones depart to their dinner, the secretary stays, growing thinner and thinner, racking his brain to record and report what he thinks that they think that they ought to have thought.
author: Arthur Bryant

quote: Beware of little expenses. A small leak will sink a great ship.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: I'm a great believer in geography being destiny.
author: Abraham Verghese

quote: I travel not to go anywhere, but to go. I travel for travel's sake. The great affair is to move.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: The truth. It is a beautiful and terrible thing, and must therefore be treated with great caution.
author: J. K. Rowling

quote: There are no great limits to growth because there are no limits of human intelligence, imagination, and wonder.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: We are at the precipice of great transformation within our culture and government.
author: Zachary Quinto

quote: It is a useless life that is not consecrated to a great ideal. It is like a stone wasted on the field without becoming a part of any edifice.
author: Jose Rizal

quote: There's a great metaphor that one of my doctors uses: If a fish is swimming in a dirty tank and it gets sick, do you take it to the vet and amputate the fin? No, you clean the water. So, I cleaned up my system. By eating organic raw greens, nuts and healthy fats, I am flooding my body with enzymes, vitamins and oxygen.
author: Kris Carr

quote: A feminist is a person who believes in the power of women just as much as they believe in the power of anyone else. It's equality, it's fairness, and I think it's a great thing to be a part of.
author: Zendaya

quote: Brevity is a great charm of eloquence.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: People can do more than they ever believe they can do. Physically, mentally, academically. You have to be pushed. It hurts. But it's worth it, and it's a great thing.
author: Sugar Ray Leonard

quote: When God created you, He went to great lengths to make you exactly the way He wanted you to be. You are His ultimate work of art.
author: Victoria Osteen

quote: The idea behind fast food is great - people want convenience.
author: Kimbal Musk

quote: A great building must begin with the unmeasurable, must go through measurable means when it is being designed and in the end must be unmeasurable.
author: Louis Kahn

quote: I am not going to Heaven because I have preached to great crowds or read the Bible many times. I'm going to Heaven just like the thief on the cross who said in that last moment: 'Lord, remember me.'
author: Billy Graham

quote: For me, it's not about price. It's about necessity, quality, and usefulness. Like, I have my Wet N Wild 666 lip liner. It's 99 cents and always has been. I started using it when I was in high school, and it's great.
author: Fergie

quote: Great effort springs naturally from great attitude.
author: Pat Riley

quote: That's another great thing about getting older. Your life is written on your face.
author: Frances McDormand

quote: I'm surrounded by great friends and family. I don't know what I would do without them.
author: Emma Roberts

quote: Life seeks life and loves life. The opening of a catkin of a willow, in the flight of the butterfly, in the chirping of a tree-toad or the sweep of an eagle - my life loves to see how others live, exults in their joy, and so far is partner in their great concern.
author: Edward Everett Hale

quote: If four things are followed - having a great aim, acquiring knowledge, hard work, and perseverance - then anything can be achieved.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: He that hath wife and children hath given hostages to fortune; for they are impediments to great enterprises, either of virtue or mischief.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: There is no great genius without some touch of madness.
author: Aristotle

quote: What happened in the past that was painful has a great deal to do with what we are today, but revisiting this painful past can contribute little or nothing to what we need to do now.
author: William Glasser

quote: Families are the compass that guide us. They are the inspiration to reach great heights, and our comfort when we occasionally falter.
author: Brad Henry

quote: That's the great thing about a tractor. You can't really hear the phone ring.
author: Jeff Foxworthy

quote: Mental health needs a great deal of attention. It's the final taboo and it needs to be faced and dealt with.
author: Adam Ant

quote: I have tried to know absolutely nothing about a great many things, and I have succeeded fairly well.
author: Robert Benchley

quote: Prejudice is a great time saver. You can form opinions without having to get the facts.
author: E. B. White

quote: I've always loved great upholstery, and think that a great sofa is one of the most important pieces of furniture in your home.
author: Bobby Berk

quote: With the right people, culture, and values, you can accomplish great things.
author: Tricia Griffith

quote: The great growling engine of change - technology.
author: Alvin Toffler

quote: Great leaders are almost always great simplifiers, who can cut through argument, debate and doubt, to offer a solution everybody can understand.
author: Colin Powell

quote: Power is the great aphrodisiac.
author: Henry Kissinger

quote: It will be a great day when our schools have all the money they need, and our air force has to have a bake-sale to buy a bomber.
author: Robert Fulghum

quote: I am hoping that I can be known as a great writer and actor some day, rather than a sex symbol.
author: Steven Seagal

quote: All great empires die from within.
author: Terry Bradshaw

quote: I am extraordinarily lucky, I was born in a family of strong moral values, and in my life I was able to do what I liked best: debuts, great theatres, but above all, inner and deep satisfaction.
author: Jose Carreras

quote: Faith is the great cop-out, the great excuse to evade the need to think and evaluate evidence. Faith is belief in spite of, even perhaps because of, the lack of evidence.
author: Richard Dawkins

quote: I am an old man and have known a great many troubles, but most of them never happened.
author: Mark Twain

quote: As a person, he was wonderful. He really was a great person. He was full of life. He had a great sense of humor. Very talented, of course, but very caring to his parents. There was a very endearing quality about Elvis.
author: Priscilla Presley

quote: It's always nice when people appreciate your work because it means you've affected them, which is great. And so that feels good.
author: Kirsten Dunst

quote: Check your ego at the door. The ego can be the great success inhibitor. It can kill opportunities, and it can kill success.
author: Dwayne Johnson

quote: I think it's great to be flawed. I am hugely flawed, and I like it this way. That's the fun of life. You fall, get up, make mistakes, learn from them, be human and be you.
author: Priyanka Chopra

quote: I think the sexiest thing about a woman is confidence, but confidence in a humble way, not in an arrogant way. Sense of humor is definitely important. And sunglasses always hide a multitude of sins. Sunglasses and a great pair of heels can turn most outfits around.
author: Victoria Beckham

quote: Where there is great love, there are always wishes.
author: Willa Cather

quote: Love and death are the two great hinges on which all human sympathies turn.
author: B. R. Hayden

quote: I love being married. It's so great to find that one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.
author: Rita Rudner

quote: Love proves itself by deeds, so how am I to show my love? Great deeds are forbidden me. The only way I can prove my love is by scattering flowers, and these flowers are every little sacrifice, every glance and word, and the doing of the least actions for love.
author: Thérèse of Lisieux

quote: A good hockey player plays where the puck is. A great hockey player plays where the puck is going to be.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: Use power to help people. For we are given power not to advance our own purposes nor to make a great show in the world, nor a name. There is but one just use of power and it is to serve people.
author: George W. Bush

quote: There are so many great things in life; why dwell on negativity?
author: Zendaya

quote: A lot of people, when a guy scores a lot of goals, think, 'He's a great player', because a goal is very important, but a great player is a player who can do everything on the field. He can do assists, encourage his colleagues, give them confidence to go forward. It is someone who, when a team does not do well, becomes one of the leaders.
author: Pele

quote: The great thing about getting older is that you become more mellow. Things aren't as black and white, and you become much more tolerant. You can see the good in things much more easily rather than getting enraged as you used to do when you were young.
author: Maeve Binchy

quote: Whether it is a tsunami, or whether it is a hurricane, whether it's an earthquake - when we see these great fatal and natural acts, men and women of every ethnic persuasion come together and they just want to help.
author: Martin Luther King III

quote: The industrial revolution has tended to produce everywhere great urban masses that seem to be increasingly careless of ethical standards.
author: Irving Babbitt

quote: During the Great Depression, levels of crime actually dropped. During the 1920s, when life was free and easy, so was crime. During the 1930s, when the entire American economy fell into a government-owned alligator moat, crime was nearly non-existent. During the 1950s and 1960s, when the economy was excellent, crime rose again.
author: Ben Shapiro

quote: The universe begins to look more like a great thought than a great machine.
author: James Jeans

quote: Like all great travellers, I have seen more than I remember, and remember more than I have seen.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: I like to listen. I have learned a great deal from listening carefully. Most people never listen.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: What is wonderful about great literature is that it transforms the man who reads it towards the condition of the man who wrote.
author: E. M. Forster

quote: Behind every great athlete is a masterful coach that inspires the athlete to evolve into the strongest performer they can become.
author: Cathy Engelbert

quote: Working with great people makes you great; you learn a lot and it also gives you the experience and confidence to move on with your own career.
author: Nas

quote: Life isn't always great, but it's all about how we react to things.
author: Jake Peavy

quote: A good idea will keep you awake during the morning, but a great idea will keep you awake during the night.
author: Marilyn vos Savant

quote: Fashion and music are two great artistic forms that can be molded by the youth culture - our taste and our passion for evolving things in our limited time on earth allows us to look at things with fresh eyes.
author: Virgil Abloh

quote: The good physician treats the disease; the great physician treats the patient who has the disease.
author: William Osler

quote: Curiosity is one of the great secrets of happiness.
author: Bryant H. McGill

quote: Great theatre is about challenging how we think and encouraging us to fantasize about a world we aspire to.
author: Willem Dafoe

quote: Everything has seasons, and we have to be able to recognize when something's time has passed and be able to move into the next season. Everything that is alive requires pruning as well, which is a great metaphor for endings.
author: Henry Cloud

quote: My great religion is a belief in the blood, the flesh, as being wiser than the intellect. We can go wrong in our minds. But what our blood feels and believes and says, is always true. The intellect is only a bit and a bridle.
author: D. H. Lawrence

quote: He was a great man, my granddad, a very calm, logical and methodical guy. I suppose I'm trying to be more like him as I get older.
author: Steven Hall

quote: The pen and the written word hold a great deal of power.
author: Andy Biersack

quote: I am the wealthiest man, not just in Europe, but in the whole world. I collect emotions. I am wealthy in that the people of Russia have twice entrusted me with the leadership of a great nation such as Russia - I believe that is my greatest wealth.
author: Vladimir Putin

quote: Our attitudes control our lives. Attitudes are a secret power working twenty-four hours a day, for good or bad. It is of paramount importance that we know how to harness and control this great force.
author: Irving Berlin

quote: Standardized testing is at cross purposes with many of the most important purposes of public education. It doesn't measure big-picture learning, critical thinking, perseverance, problem solving, creativity or curiosity, yet those are the qualities great teaching brings out in a student.
author: Randi Weingarten

quote: The digital camera is a great invention because it allows us to reminisce. Instantly.
author: Demetri Martin

quote: It is great seeing the fruits of your labor. The joy I have in watching my daughters with their kids is great, because they're doing a wonderful job, and the kids are fantastic.
author: Billy Crystal

quote: All of the great social justice advances that we ever had in this country have come not from people with big titles and not from people at the top, but just from everyday people getting together saying 'Enough is enough. I'm going to change this, and I'm going to get involved, and I am going to be engaged.'
author: Nina Turner

quote: An entire nation, it seemed, was standing in one long breadline, desperate for even the barest essentials. It was a crisis of monumental proportions. It was known as the Great Depression.
author: Kathi Appelt

quote: Great occasions do not make heroes or cowards; they simply unveil them to the eyes of men. Silently and imperceptibly, as we wake or sleep, we grow strong or weak; and at last some crisis shows what we have become.
author: Brooke Foss Westcott

quote: Great dancers are not great because of their technique, they are great because of their passion.
author: Martha Graham

quote: We should always look upon ourselves as God's servants, placed in God's world, to do his work; and accordingly labour faithfully for him; not with a design to grow rich and great, but to glorify God, and do all the good we possibly can.
author: David Brainerd

quote: Man has two great spiritual needs. One is for forgiveness. The other is for goodness.
author: Billy Graham

quote: Great partnerships thrive because the people need each other.
author: Courtney A. Kemp

quote: My father always used to say that when you die, if you've got five real friends, then you've had a great life.
author: Lee Iacocca

quote: A great deal of intelligence can be invested in ignorance when the need for illusion is deep.
author: Saul Bellow

quote: A complainer is like a Death Eater because there's a suction of negative energy. You can catch a great attitude from great people.
author: Barbara Corcoran

quote: My childhood was great, honestly. I have all these incredible memories of my childhood. I was an only child. I always had all my cousins around. I had my grandparents around. I had my parents around. I had my uncles around - whatever.
author: Action Bronson

quote: But Hopes are Shy Birds flying at a great distance seldom reached by the best of Guns.
author: John James Audubon

quote: I discovered that no revival comes if we don't preach the Word of God under the anointing of the Holy Spirit. If we only have the Great Commission and only the Holy Spirit, we have power without purpose, or purpose without power. It is a package deal, and that is what God honors.
author: Reinhard Bonnke

quote: There's a reason Tony Stark makes fun of 'Thor,' and mentions 'Shakespeare' in the park in 'The Avengers.' It's great to play high drama and comedy alongside a modern story.
author: Joss Whedon

quote: At one point, I recognized that Warren Buffett, though he had every advantage in learning from Ben Graham, did not copy Ben Graham but, rather, set out on his own path and ran money his way, by his own rules... I also immediately internalized the idea that no school could teach someone how to be a great investor.
author: Michael Burry

quote: A great book should leave you with many experiences, and slightly exhausted. You should live several lives while reading it.
author: William Styron

quote: I love Australia; it was a really, really nice experience for me. It's such a beautiful place. The people are beautiful - like, really beautiful - and they are beautiful in terms of their personalities. It's a great place to be. It's like you are in a little bit of a dream world.
author: Shawn Mendes

quote: The great leaders are like the best conductors - they reach beyond the notes to reach the magic in the players.
author: Blaine Lee

quote: The desire for safety stands against every great and noble enterprise.
author: Tacitus

quote: Mental prayer in my opinion is nothing else than an intimate sharing between friends; it means taking time frequently to be alone with Him who we know loves us. The important thing is not to think much but to love much and so do that which best stirs you to love. Love is not great delight but desire to please God in everything.
author: Saint Teresa of Avila

quote: A great man does not seek applause or place; he seeks for truth; he seeks the road to happiness, and what he ascertains, he gives to others.
author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: I have great belief in the fact that whenever there is chaos, it creates wonderful thinking. I consider chaos a gift.
author: Septima Poinsette Clark

quote: Of thousands of others, nearer the centre of the explosion, there was no trace. They vanished. The theory in Hiroshima is that the atomic heat was so great that they burned instantly to ashes - except that there were no ashes.
author: Wilfred Burchett

quote: Anyone can dream up great ideas, but an idea is nothing until it's realized, be it as a website, a physical product, an app, or a user interface.
author: Jens Martin Skibsted

quote: If you look at great human civilizations, from the Roman Empire to the Soviet Union, you will see that most do not fail simply due to external threats but because of internal weakness, corruption, or a failure to manifest the values and ideals they espouse.
author: Cory Booker

quote: The way I see things, the way I see life, I see it as a struggle. And there's a great deal of reward I have gained coming to that understanding - that existence is a struggle.
author: Harvey Keitel

quote: An understanding of the natural world and what's in it is a source of not only a great curiosity but great fulfillment.
author: David Attenborough

quote: Great wits are sure to madness near allied, and thin partitions do their bounds divide.
author: John Dryden

quote: The protection of biodiversity and, therefore, of endangered species is an issue to which I attach a great deal of importance.
author: Albert II, Prince of Monaco

quote: Scientists dream about doing great things. Engineers do them.
author: James A. Michener

quote: Each person is an enigma. You're a puzzle not only to yourself but also to everyone else, and the great mystery of our time is how we penetrate this puzzle.
author: Theodore Zeldin

quote: I have great genes. Thank you to my mom and dad for that one.
author: Gloria Estefan

quote: For everything bad, there's a million really exciting things, whether it's someone puts out a really great book, there's a new movie, there's a new detective, the sky is unbelievably golden, or you have the best cup of coffee you ever had in your life.
author: Patti Smith

quote: Sometimes we look back and 10 years from now we think, 'Boy, those were great old days.' Well, you know, we're living in the good old days.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: If you do build a great experience, customers tell each other about that. Word of mouth is very powerful.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: Dreams can still come true; you need a great deal of energy and determination, and a little bit of luck.
author: Stefano Gabbana

quote: There is no despair so absolute as that which comes with the first moments of our first great sorrow, when we have not yet known what it is to have suffered and be healed, to have despaired and have recovered hope.
author: George Eliot

quote: A great many people think they are thinking when they are merely rearranging their prejudices.
author: William James

quote: Near the gates and within two cities there will be scourges the like of which was never seen: famine within plague, people put out by steel, crying to the great immortal God for relief.
author: Nostradamus

quote: I never wanted to be famous. I only wanted to be great.
author: Ray Charles

quote: Ninety-nine percent of the people in the world are fools and the rest of us are in great danger of contagion.
author: Thornton Wilder

quote: Women, by their nature, are not exceptional chess players: they are not great fighters.
author: Garry Kasparov

quote: A great business at a fair price is superior to a fair business at a great price.
author: Charlie Munger

quote: I'm a great believer that any tool that enhances communication has profound effects in terms of how people can learn from each other, and how they can achieve the kind of freedoms that they're interested in.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Every great film should seem new every time you see it.
author: Roger Ebert

quote: Social media, unfortunately, just makes it a lot easier to be jealous. It sets up false expectations of reality, so it's really easy to look at someone else's life online and assume that they have everything going great for them and that their life is perfect.
author: Franchesca Ramsey

quote: A man's work is nothing but this slow trek to rediscover, through the detours of art, those two or three great and simple images in whose presence his heart first opened.
author: Albert Camus

quote: To the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure.
author: J. K. Rowling

quote: There are two powers in the world; one is the sword and the other is the pen. There is a great competition and rivalry between the two. There is a third power stronger than both, that of the women.
author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

quote: For most of us, the great danger is not that we will renounce our faith. It is that we will become so distracted and rushed and preoccupied that we will settle for a mediocre version of it. We will just skim our lives instead of actually living them.
author: John Ortberg

quote: It's never too late to be great.
author: Jordan Burroughs

quote: Violin playing is a physical art with great traditions behind it.
author: Vanessa Mae

quote: Collective action remains the best way of renewing the march towards the great trinity of liberty, equality, and solidarity.
author: Guy Standing

quote: Innovation comes out of great human ingenuity and very personal passions.
author: Megan Smith

quote: The ancient Greek philosophers were blonde and blue-eyed and, even then, talked about how their race was mixed with others and how this affected their society negatively. When there were no more natural blondes and no more blue eyes in Greece, they incidentally stopped producing great philosophers.
author: Varg Vikernes

quote: At forty-five degrees, the sky will burn. Fire to approach the great new city; in an instant, a great scattered flame will leap up, when one will want to get evidence from the Normans.
author: Nostradamus

quote: Mistakes are part of the game. It's how well you recover from them, that's the mark of a great player.
author: Alice Cooper

quote: My great concern is not whether you have failed, but whether you are content with your failure.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: When you have a quality mattress, great sheets, and a good duvet with the perfect fill, it all works together to give you the perfect sleep.
author: Jonathan Scott

quote: We feel very honored to have been offered the responsibility to host this great event, Berlin is a wonderful city that is developing at a tremendous rate, and this decision means that we can now prepare to welcome the world's best athletes to a fascinating place.
author: Otto Schily

quote: The essence of all beautiful art, all great art, is gratitude.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: To be Catholic puts a lot of fear in you. It's a great religion, but also one that can limit your experience. You fear experience because everything is a sin.
author: Donatella Versace

quote: I was a bellman - a great hotel, five-star hotel in Boston. I made great money. I made cash every day. I had good benefits. We had 401k. All the things you could ask for in a great job, I had. You know what I didn't have? I hated my job.
author: Dana White

quote: I've changed my diet a few times. Now I'm trying to eat more protein. I eat little meals throughout the day. I love food, so I still give myself great meals. Also, when I'm busy, it's easy to lose weight.
author: Michael Keaton

quote: All great and beautiful work has come of first gazing without shrinking into the darkness.
author: John Ruskin

quote: To be conscious that you are ignorant of the facts is a great step to knowledge.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: A great tailor is like a great personal trainer - they tailor that suit to your natural physique.
author: Jidenna

quote: Do you have hands? Excellent. That's a good start. Can you hold a pencil? Great. If you have a sketchbook, open it and start by making a line, a mark, wherever. Doodle.
author: Chris Riddell

quote: World War II ended the Great Depression with one of the great public-private industrial collaborations in the history of man.
author: Jon Meacham

quote: Great journalism will always attract readers. The words, pictures and graphics that are the stuff of journalism have to be brilliantly packaged; they must feed the mind and move the heart.
author: Rupert Murdoch

quote: The first test of a truly great man is his humility. By humility I don't mean doubt of his powers or hesitation in speaking his opinion, but merely an understanding of the relationship of what he can say and what he can do.
author: John Ruskin

quote: The great advantage about telling the truth is that nobody ever believes it.
author: Dorothy L. Sayers

quote: The hero is one who kindles a great light in the world, who sets up blazing torches in the dark streets of life for men to see by.
author: Felix Adler

quote: I'm not a big fan of religion for that reason. But I am a true believer in God, and I have great faith, and I think that a spiritual connection with something is a really important part of our experience. That doesn't necessarily have anything to do with the church.
author: Shaun Cassidy

quote: I feel like life is really short, and it's important to enjoy yourself and embrace whatever comes your way, whether it's a challenging day or a great day, just welcome it with open arms. No matter who you are, you can't escape challenges; they are part of life.
author: Miranda Kerr

quote: Everyone has inside of him a piece of good news. The good news is that you don't know how great you can be! How much you can love! What you can accomplish! And what your potential is!
author: Anne Frank

quote: Great leaders have a heart for people. They take time for people. They view people as the bottom line, not as a tool to get to the bottom line.
author: Pat Williams

quote: By nature, I'm a very positive person, and because I'm happy in myself, and in my life, and I've got a great husband, and beautiful children, and I have a job that I love that calls for a certain amount of emotional expression, I get to realise a lot of my dreams and aspirations.
author: Kate Winslet

quote: The great thing about cake is it doesn't feel like work. You forget about work. Kids, adults, they all get the same look in their eye when they're decorating cakes... That's the magic right there.
author: Duff Goldman

quote: Above all things let us never forget that mankind constitutes one great brotherhood; all born to encounter suffering and sorrow, and therefore bound to sympathize with each other.
author: Albert Pike

quote: I am not a great cook, I am not a great artist, but I love art, and I love food, so I am the perfect traveller.
author: Michael Palin

quote: A great man's greatest good luck is to die at the right time.
author: Eric Hoffer

quote: I do not think you can name many great inventions that have been made by married men.
author: Nikola Tesla

quote: I look back on my career and my time as commissioner with great fondness.
author: Mick Foley

quote: Give a little love to a child, and you get a great deal back.
author: John Ruskin

quote: The point is that when I see a sunset or a waterfall or something, for a split second it's so great, because for a little bit I'm out of my brain, and it's got nothing to do with me. I'm not trying to figure it out, you know what I mean? And I wonder if I can somehow find a way to maintain that mind stillness.
author: Chris Evans

quote: Children are our second chance to have a great parent-child relationship.
author: Laura Schlessinger

quote: Every great achievement is but a small peak in the mountain range of contributions.
author: Dale T. Mortensen

quote: The great solution to all human problems is individual inner transformation.
author: Vernon Howard

quote: I'm in love with red. I think it's such a passionate color. Every flag of every country pretty much has red it it. It's power, there's no fence sitting with red. Either you love it or you don't. I think its blood and strength and life. I do love red. I love all colors. Great shades of blue, you find them in nature. They're all magic.
author: Bryan Batt

quote: There are two great rules of life: never tell everything at once.
author: Ken Venturi

quote: If your determination is fixed, I do not counsel you to despair. Few things are impossible to diligence and skill. Great works are performed not by strength, but perseverance.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: You cannot live to please everyone else. You have to edify, educate and fulfill your own dreams and destiny, and hope that whatever your art is that you're putting out there, if it's received, great, I respect you for receiving it. If it's not received, great, I respect you for not.
author: Octavia Spencer

quote: A great day in New York would be to wake up, get a cup of coffee and head up to Central Park for a nice walk. Then I'd go down to the East Village and stroll around. After that, maybe I'd go check out a museum or catch an indie film at the Angelika.
author: Emmanuelle Chriqui

quote: Men and women must be educated, in a great degree, by the opinions and manners of the society they live in.
author: Mary Wollstonecraft

quote: Discrimination due to age is one of the great tragedies of modern life. The desire to work and be useful is what makes life worth living, and to be told your efforts are not needed because you are the wrong age is a crime.
author: Johnny Ball
