quote: I like cats a lot. I've always liked cats. They're great company. When they eat, they always leave a little bit at the bottom of the bowl. A dog will polish the bowl, but a cat always leaves a little bit. It's like an offering.
author: Christopher Walken

quote: Ah, great it is to believe the dream as we stand in youth by the starry stream; but a greater thing is to fight life through and say at the end, the dream is true!
author: Edwin Markham

quote: Canada is like a loft apartment over a really great party.
author: Robin Williams

quote: Great dreams of great dreamers are always transcended.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: If you have great talents, industry will improve them; if you have but moderate abilities, industry will supply their deficiency.
author: Joshua Reynolds

quote: Being the captain is a great privilege and a responsibility to lead a great group with different cultures.
author: Sergio Ramos

quote: To accomplish great things we must first dream, then visualize, then plan... believe... act!
author: Alfred A. Montapert

quote: As usual, there is a great woman behind every idiot.
author: John Lennon

quote: My job as a leader is to make sure everybody in the company has great opportunities, and that they feel they're having a meaningful impact and are contributing to the good of society. As a world, we're doing a better job of that. My goal is for Google to lead, not follow that.
author: Larry Page

quote: The bravest sight in the world is to see a great man struggling against adversity.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: To know how to hide one's ability is great skill.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: A great man is always willing to be little.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Whatever you do, take pride in it and be great at it.
author: Dolph Ziggler

quote: Embrace a diversity of ideas. Embrace the fact that you can disagree with people and not be disagreeable. Embrace the fact that you can find common ground - if you disagree on nine out of 10 things, but can find common ground on that 10th, maybe you can make progress. If you can find common ground, you can accomplish great things.
author: David Boies

quote: I'm not perfect. I'm never going to be. And that's the great thing about living the Christian life and trying to live by faith, is you're trying to get better every day. You're trying to improve.
author: Tim Tebow

quote: The sofa is a really important investment for anybody, and I don't mean financially. You need to find a really great sofa that can transition with you, and you can build from there.
author: Jeremiah Brent

quote: Music is great; it all depends on what mood you're in, what you want to listen to. If it's party time, you listen to, you know, party music, if you want to dance with somebody. But then again, if it's a slow dance, you need something slow.
author: Tom Jones

quote: Childhood vaccines are one of the great triumphs of modern medicine. Indeed, parents whose children are vaccinated no longer have to worry about their child's death or disability from whooping cough, polio, diphtheria, hepatitis, or a host of other infections.
author: Ezekiel Emanuel

quote: Great men are rare, poets are rarer, but the great man who is a poet, transfiguring his greatness, is the rarest of all events.
author: John Drinkwater

quote: Pop changes week to week, month to month. But great music is like literature.
author: Ravi Shankar

quote: Everybody wants to be good, but not many are prepared to make the sacrifices it takes to be great. To many people, being nice in order to be liked is more important. There's equal merit in that, but you must not confuse being good with being liked.
author: Paul Arden

quote: Pursue one great decisive aim with force and determination.
author: Carl von Clausewitz

quote: You say that you are my judge; I do not know if you are; but take good heed not to judge me ill, because you would put yourself in great peril.
author: Joan of Arc

quote: Nature's great masterpiece, an elephant; the only harmless great thing.
author: John Donne

quote: My message, especially to young people is to have courage to think differently, courage to invent, to travel the unexplored path, courage to discover the impossible and to conquer the problems and succeed. These are great qualities that they must work towards. This is my message to the young people.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: I really like Nicki Minaj. I think she's great.
author: Robert Pattinson

quote: I believe in the power of great clothing. It can evoke confidence, beauty, and a sense of glamour.
author: Tina Knowles

quote: Justice, sir, is the great interest of man on earth. It is the ligament which holds civilized beings and civilized nations together.
author: Daniel Webster

quote: Great is truth, but still greater, from a practical point of view, is silence about truth. By simply not mentioning certain subjects... totalitarian propagandists have influenced opinion much more effectively than they could have by the most eloquent denunciations.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: As far as Saddam Hussein being a great military strategist, he is neither a strategist, nor is he schooled in the operational arts, nor is he a tactician, nor is he a general, nor is he a soldier. Other than that, he's a great military man, I want you to know that.
author: Norman Schwarzkopf

quote: Every gift which is given, even though it be small, is in reality great, if it is given with affection.
author: Pindar

quote: Making money is a happiness. And that's a great incentive. Making other people happy is a super-happiness.
author: Muhammad Yunus

quote: I woke up and realized life is great and people are awesome and life is worth living.
author: Hulk Hogan

quote: That's the great thing about filmmaking: Things happen you don't know are going to happen at the end.
author: Thelma Schoonmaker

quote: A little flattery will support a man through great fatigue.
author: James Monroe

quote: Entrepreneurs are great at dealing with uncertainty and also very good at minimizing risk. That's the classic great entrepreneur.
author: Mohnish Pabrai

quote: Every day, every one of us sets the stage for our sentiment, our confidence, and our success by getting dressed. When you feel great, when you feel your best, it opens up a world of possibility. Feeling confident and self-assured are important inputs into good days, successful days, and happy days.
author: Katrina Lake

quote: Man as an individual is a genius. But men in the mass form the headless monster, a great, brutish idiot that goes where prodded.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: Research shows that there is only half as much variation in student achievement between schools as there is among classrooms in the same school. If you want your child to get the best education possible, it is actually more important to get him assigned to a great teacher than to a great school.
author: Bill Gates

quote: I think happiness is a choice. If you feel yourself being happy and can settle in to the life choices you make, then it's great. It's really, really great. I swear to God, happiness is the best makeup.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: The world is the great gymnasium where we come to make ourselves strong.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: Great minds have purposes; others have wishes.
author: Washington Irving

quote: I think one of the great problems we have in the Republican Party is that we don't encourage you to be nasty. We encourage you to be neat, obedient, loyal and faithful and all those Boy Scout words, which would be great around a campfire but are lousy in politics.
author: Newt Gingrich

quote: Every man of action has a strong dose of egoism, pride, hardness, and cunning. But all those things will be regarded as high qualities if he can make them the means to achieve great ends.
author: Giorgos Seferis

quote: I do my work and do the best I can. I'm quite happy with my anonymity. All I can ever hope for is that I continue to do great work that will be remembered, and I leave my imprint so that my son can say proudly, 'That's my dad!'
author: Eamonn Walker

quote: Black is a great colour when it comes to being safe and classy. It looks great on any body type and can be paired with anything. So when in doubt, go for black.
author: Karishma Tanna

quote: People say, 'Dream big!' - but you have to think about the logistics. It's not just coming up with a great idea; it's how you can sell or market or promote that great idea.
author: Marley Dias

quote: As Faulkner says, all of us have the capacity in us for great good and for great evil, for love but also for hate. I wanted to write those kinds of complex character in a fantasy, and not just have all the good people get together to fight the bad guy.
author: George R. R. Martin

quote: My life is about ups and downs, great joys and great losses.
author: Isabel Allende

quote: I love having a croissant and a great cup of coffee. Just one cup.
author: Marcus Samuelsson

quote: Prosperity tries the fortunate, adversity the great.
author: Rose Kennedy

quote: The happiness of most people is not ruined by great catastrophes or fatal errors, but by the repetition of slowly destructive little things.
author: Ernest Dimnet

quote: I just feel like I'm the luckiest person in the world being able to do what I love and be able to do it all day every day if I like, you know, I mean it's great, I love it.
author: Faith Ringgold

quote: Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.
author: Epictetus

quote: Every day I wake up and I lay in bed counting my blessings and saying my prayers for how fortunate I am to have great fans and health and family.
author: Luke Bryan

quote: Perseverance is a great element of success. If you only knock long enough and loud enough at the gate, you are sure to wake up somebody.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: In reading the lives of great men, I found that the first victory they won was over themselves... self-discipline with all of them came first.
author: Harry S Truman

quote: Our great national drama was a westward expansion that conquered a native population rather than coexisting with it.
author: Ross Douthat

quote: Cash - in savings accounts, short-term CDs or money market deposits - is great for an emergency fund. But to fulfill a long-term investment goal like funding your retirement, consider buying stocks. The more distant your financial target, the longer inflation will gnaw at the purchasing power of your money.
author: Suze Orman

quote: No great man lives in vain. The history of the world is but the biography of great men.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: I've heard the stories. Like, Eric Clapton said he wanted to burn his guitar when he heard Jimi Hendrix play. I never understood that because, when I went and saw a great drummer or heard one, all I wanted to do was practice.
author: Neil Peart

quote: Sport is a great equalizer that can build bridges, transcend borders and cultures, and render even the fiercest conflicts temporarily irrelevant.
author: Richard Attias

quote: When it's good it's great, it's really great.
author: Jennifer Connelly

quote: Tennis is a mental game. Everyone is fit, everyone hits great forehands and backhands.
author: Novak Djokovic

quote: What great thing would you attempt if you knew you could not fail?
author: Robert H. Schuller

quote: A great wind is blowing, and that gives you either imagination or a headache.
author: Catherine the Great

quote: Nothing great will ever be achieved without great men, and men are great only if they are determined to be so.
author: Charles de Gaulle

quote: Curiosity about life in all of its aspects, I think, is still the secret of great creative people.
author: Leo Burnett

quote: We hire military veterans because they make great employees. They bring proven technical and leadership skills. They understand teamwork, and they're adaptable. Bottom line, hiring veterans is good for business.
author: Randall L. Stephenson

quote: Every great political campaign rewrites the rules; devising a new way to win is what gives campaigns a comparative advantage against their foes.
author: John Podhoretz

quote: High school is what kind of grows you into the person you are. I have great memories, good and bad, some learning experiences and some that I'll take with me the rest of my life.
author: Giancarlo Stanton

quote: Our Generation has had no Great war, no Great Depression. Our war is spiritual. Our depression is our lives.
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: A great man is a torch in the darkness, a beacon in superstition's night, an inspiration and a prophecy.
author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: Throughout human history, in any great endeavour requiring the common effort of many nations and men and women everywhere, we have learned - it is only through seriousness of purpose and persistence that we ultimately carry the day. We might liken it to riding a bicycle. You stay upright and move forward so long as you keep up the momentum.
author: Ban Ki-moon

quote: Another thing I like to do is sit back and take in nature. To look at the birds, listen to their singing, go hiking, camping and jogging and running, walking along the beach, playing games and sometimes being alone with the great outdoors. It's very special to me.
author: Larry Wilcox

quote: Death comes to all, but great achievements build a monument which shall endure until the sun grows cold.
author: Georg Fabricius

quote: Americans are the great Satan, the wounded snake.
author: Ruhollah Khomeini

quote: I'm not a hunter, but I've been around guns all my life. I'm a great shot.
author: Sam Elliott

quote: Great is the victory, but the friendship of all is greater.
author: Emil Zatopek

quote: It's great to be here. It's great to be anywhere.
author: Keith Richards

quote: There are hurdles, there are handicaps, hardships you have to face in life, but you hope for a great future.
author: Anil Kapoor

quote: Prosperity is a great teacher; adversity a greater.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: Self-confidence is the first requisite to great undertakings.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: The great fights with your strongest rivals are always the biggest motivation. When you win easily it's not the same taste.
author: Valentino Rossi

quote: I believe in giving more than 100% on the field, and I don't really worry about the result if there's great commitment on the field. That's victory for me.
author: MS Dhoni

quote: Fake eyelashes are a great way to step up your look to the next level.
author: Jeffree Star

quote: There are many of us that are willing to do great things for the Lord, but few of us are willing to do little things.
author: Dwight L. Moody

quote: Study what you love, and you'll never have to work a day in your life. It'll be one great adventure.
author: David Gerrold

quote: I am a great admirer of mystery and magic. Look at this life - all mystery and magic.
author: Harry Houdini

quote: Great things are not done by impulse, but by a series of small things brought together.
author: George Eliot

quote: Do not say a little in many words but a great deal in a few.
author: Pythagoras

quote: People are going to copy your product if you build great stuff. Just because Yahoo has a search box doesn't make it Google.
author: Evan Spiegel

quote: All of the great leaders have had one characteristic in common: it was the willingness to confront unequivocally the major anxiety of their people in their time. This, and not much else, is the essence of leadership.
author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quote: Myself when young did eagerly frequent doctor and saint, and heard great argument about it and about: but evermore came out by the same door as in I went.
author: Omar Khayyam

quote: In my life, I have dreamt of seeing the great herds of wild animals, jungles and rainforests full of birds and butterflies, but now I wonder if they will even exist for my children to see.
author: Severn Cullis-Suzuki

quote: Great hopes make great men.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: I'm never satisfied with my performance. I want to keep pushing myself. The great thing about being an actor is you're always learning. That's what excites me about the job and what continues to drive me.
author: Drew Fuller

quote: People who know little are usually great talkers, while men who know much say little.
author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: Anybody can be a great photographer if they zoom in enough on what they love.
author: David Bailey

quote: I'm someone who likes to try new things and take on new challenges. I love making movies, but TV is also great. I really enjoy doing both.
author: Kelsey Grammer

quote: You show me anybody that's great in anything they do, I'll show you somebody that's persevered, demonstrated that mental toughness to overcome some obstacles and adversity.
author: Sean McVay

quote: Nurture your minds with great thoughts. To believe in the heroic makes heroes.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Art begins with resistance - at the point where resistance is overcome. No human masterpiece has ever been created without great labor.
author: Andre Gide

quote: Character is higher than intellect. A great soul will be strong to live as well as think.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Zumba is a great dance-cardio option that's an immersive experience for participants and is not only effective but allows you to express yourself while getting in shape.
author: Jason Derulo

quote: Society is composed of two great classes those who have more dinners than appetite, and those who have more appetite than dinners.
author: Nicolas Chamfort

quote: What's great about this country is that America started the tradition where the richest consumers buy essentially the same things as the poorest. You can be watching TV and see Coca-Cola, and you can know that the President drinks Coke. Liz Taylor drinks Coke, and just think, you can drink Coke, too.
author: Andy Warhol

quote: It feels great to be home, great to be back as a part of the community.
author: Brian Jordan

quote: You can never go wrong when you have a great team to work with.
author: Kubra Sait

quote: If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it. And, like any great relationship, it just gets better and better as the years roll on.

quote: The great thing about rock and roll is that someone like me can be a star.
author: Elton John

quote: I have a great family, I live an amazing life.
author: John Oates

quote: The past is a great place and I don't want to erase it or to regret it, but I don't want to be its prisoner either.
author: Mick Jagger

quote: He's the most incredible man. He's so generous and kind, and he helps so many people, and, um, he makes me laugh like I've never laughed, and he's a great friend.
author: Katie Holmes

quote: Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and some hire public relations officers.
author: Daniel J. Boorstin

quote: Sometimes you just vibe with people. Some people have great energy, and you click with them, and you just wanna have a good time.
author: Rotimi

quote: The difference between something good and something great is attention to detail.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: A man must live like a great brilliant flame and burn as brightly as he can. In the end he burns out. But this is far better than a mean little flame.
author: Boris Yeltsin

quote: God gave me a great body and it's my duty to take care of my physical temple.
author: Jean-Claude Van Damme

quote: Great moments are born from great oppurtunities.
author: Herb Brooks

quote: The change I want to see is a start-up environment where everyone, regardless of gender and background, feels welcome and safe; where sexual harassment or discrimination will not impede great talent from producing great impact.
author: Christine Tsai

quote: The gift that has been given to me says much about our capacity for great compassion and generosity, and I hope it sends an inspiring message to others about the importance of organ donation.
author: Steven Cojocaru

quote: Always keep your mind as bright and clear as the vast sky, the great ocean, and the highest peak, empty of all thoughts. Always keep your body filled with light and heat. Fill yourself with the power of wisdom and enlightenment.
author: Morihei Ueshiba

quote: A weak mind is like a microscope, which magnifies trifling things, but cannot receive great ones.
author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield

quote: I am grateful to be a woman. I must have done something great in another life.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: I would want my legacy to be that I was a great son, father and friend.
author: Dante Hall

quote: Government is the great fiction, through which everybody endeavors to live at the expense of everybody else.
author: Frederic Bastiat

quote: Great men of action... never mind on occasion being ridiculous; in a sense it is part of their job, and at times they all are.
author: Oswald Mosley

quote: So she went into the garden to cut a cabbage-leaf, to make an apple-pie; and at the same time a great she-bear, coming up the street, pops its head into the shop. 'What! no soap?' So he died, and she very imprudently married the barber.
author: Samuel Foote

quote: I may climb perhaps to no great heights, but I will climb alone.
author: Cyrano de Bergerac

quote: Our political leaders have great responsibilities, but as with many situations in life, people often rise or fall to meet your expectations. Our responsibility as citizens is to expect our leaders to lead and to give them enough support so that they may do so.
author: Paul Polman

quote: I'm really, really enjoying myself, I seem to have a lot of purpose in my life. I'm enjoying what I'm doing, you know, and people are liking it. So, it's great, you know.
author: Robbie Williams

author: Naveen Jain

quote: When more Americans prefer freebies to freedom, these great United States will become a fertile ground for tyranny.
author: Allen West

quote: The great earthquake shall be in the month of May; Saturn, Capricorn, Jupiter, Mercury in Taurus; Venus, also Cancer, Mars in zero.
author: Nostradamus

quote: I've gotten to travel all over the world and meet all kinds of people and do all kinds of great things, so it's, like, surreal. It just lets you know how time flies, especially when you're having fun. It seems like time keeps going by faster as I get older.
author: Mekhi Phifer

quote: I think that's the great thing about interiors is that they can be treated like a great wardrobe. Choose a sofa and chairs that are staples in clean shapes that will keep for the next couple of years or decade. Then an easy way to bump up your entire room or your interiors is accessories.
author: Jeremiah Brent

quote: When you go to war as a boy, you have a great illusion of immortality. Other people get killed, not you... Then, when you are badly wounded the first time, you lose that illusion, and you know it can happen to you.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: The great hope of society is in individual character.
author: William Ellery Channing

quote: I'm done losing weight, I feel great, and I love looking like a woman. I love being curvy and having boobs and hips. It's hot. I don't ever want to be size zero.
author: Sara Rue

quote: Any great warrior is also a scholar, and a poet, and an artist.
author: Steven Seagal

quote: I must be a mermaid, Rango. I have no fear of depths and a great fear of shallow living.
author: Anais Nin

quote: I love to laugh, and laughter is one of my favorite things. When you have a really good laugh, you feel great afterwards.
author: Bill Engvall

quote: You have to come to your closed doors before you get to your open doors... What if you knew you had to go through 32 closed doors before you got to your open door? Well, then you'd come to closed door number eight and you'd think, 'Great, I got another one out of the way'... Keep moving forward.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: If we can understand that death is not the end but is really a transition into the next life, the great part of life, that frees us up into receiving God's courage and his help.
author: Max Lucado

quote: I'm never bored, never ever bored. If I've got a day off I'll sit in a cafe and watch and observe. I'm a great observer.
author: David Suchet

quote: Her angel's face, As the great eye of heaven shined bright, And made a sunshine in the shady place.
author: Edmund Spenser

quote: I am a firm believer in education and have worked very hard to tell young Latinos that they must go to college and that, if possible, they should pursue an advanced degree. I am convinced that education is the great equalizer.
author: Jimmy Smits

quote: Great ambition is the passion of a great character. Those endowed with it may perform very good or very bad acts. All depends on the principles which direct them.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: I've had great success being a total idiot.
author: Jerry Lewis

quote: Great deeds are usually wrought at great risks.
author: Herodotus

quote: My great hope is to laugh as much as I cry; to get my work done and try to love somebody and have the courage to accept the love in return.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: I lost seventy pounds eating nothing but Jello for 4 months. But of course there is great variety in the colors! I think, if I remember correctly, it's 230 calories for a whole bowl. Maybe 270? In the 5th month, I added fruit.
author: John Malkovich

quote: God Almighty has set before me two great objects: the suppression of the slave trade and the reformation of manners.
author: William Wilberforce

quote: You need great passion, because everything you do with great pleasure, you do well.
author: Juan Manuel Fangio

quote: There is a lot of suffering and injustice in the world, and there is also a great deal of hope. When you step forward and start speaking about what you see and what you want to change, you can begin living in that hope instead of despair.
author: Sonita Alizadeh

quote: Meditation is a great way to keep my body well-centered while juggling shooting schedules and recording sessions.
author: Ariana Grande

quote: Love and hate have a magical transforming power. They are the great soul changers. We grow through their exercise into the likeness of what we contemplate.
author: George William Russell

quote: Sad will be the day for any man when he becomes contented with the thoughts he is thinking and the deeds he is doing - where there is not forever beating at the doors of his soul some great desire to do something larger; which he knows he was meant and made to do.
author: Phillips Brooks

quote: Without an open-minded mind, you can never be a great success.
author: Martha Stewart

quote: It is a melancholy truth that even great men have their poor relations.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: Great art is the outward expression of an inner life in the artist, and this inner life will result in his personal vision of the world.
author: Edward Hopper

quote: Sausage is a great deal like life. You get out of it about what you put into it.
author: Jimmy Dean

quote: Eating is one of the great pleasures of life.
author: Adam Mansbach

quote: A visit to Marrakesh was a great shock to me. This city taught me color.
author: Yves Saint Laurent

quote: We used to think that if we knew one, we knew two, because one and one are two. We are finding that we must learn a great deal more about 'and'.

quote: All men who have achieved great things have been great dreamers.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: For precocity some great price is always demanded sooner or later in life.
author: Margaret Fuller

quote: The ingredients of health and long life, are great temperance, open air, easy labor, and little care.
author: Philip Sidney

quote: In my estimation, there should always be a mixture of economic liberalism - which means small government, a great emphasis on markets - but also a certain degree of social conservatism, not to favor change unless that change is beneficial. So I describe myself as an economic liberal and a social conservative.
author: John Howard

quote: I am concerned for the security of our great Nation; not so much because of any threat from without, but because of the insidious forces working from within.
author: Douglas MacArthur

quote: All the great legends are Templates for human behavior. I would define a myth as a story that has survived.
author: John Boorman

quote: I am so blessed. I have an incredible wife, children I adore; I'm a very happy man. I've got a great mom and dad and brothers and sisters and stuff, so I've always been happy. And I never stop smiling.
author: Michael Kelly

quote: There is no recipe to be a great teacher, that's what is unique about them.
author: Robert Sternberg

quote: Forgive, O Lord, my little jokes on Thee, and I'll forgive Thy great big joke on me.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Great companies start because the founders want to change the world... not make a fast buck.
author: Guy Kawasaki

quote: Failure to accord credit to anyone for what he may have done is a great weakness in any man.
author: William Howard Taft

quote: Love is a great beautifier.
author: Louisa May Alcott

quote: If you listen to your fears, you will die never knowing what a great person you might have been.
author: Robert H. Schuller

quote: It is of great importance to our country generally, and especially to our navigating and whaling interests, that the Pacific Coast and, indeed, the whole of our territory west of the Rocky Mountains, should speedily be filled up by a hardy and patriotic population.
author: James K. Polk

quote: If fear is the great enemy of intimacy, love is its true friend.
author: Henri Nouwen

quote: I believe that in a great city, or even in a small city or a village, a great theater is the outward and visible sign of an inward and probable culture.
author: Laurence Olivier

quote: I don't believe in perfection. I don't think there is such a thing. But the energy of wanting things to be great is a perfectionist energy.

quote: Donald Trump is a great friend, and he has four or five Picassos on his plane. And that's where I would look at them.
author: Shaquille O'Neal

quote: Great love affairs start with Champagne and end with tisane.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: All architecture is shelter, all great architecture is the design of space that contains, cuddles, exalts, or stimulates the persons in that space.
author: Philip Johnson

quote: Through our great good fortune, in our youth our hearts were touched with fire. It was given to us to learn at the outset that life is a profound and passionate thing.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quote: A little thought and a little kindness are often worth more than a great deal of money.
author: John Ruskin

quote: Globalization can be a great opportunity.
author: Emmanuel Macron

quote: In terms of fashion, I love adding a fun scarf to whatever I'm wearing - it's a great way to dress up a plain outfit!
author: Bridgit Mendler

quote: The sea, the great unifier, is man's only hope. Now, as never before, the old phrase has a literal meaning: we are all in the same boat.
author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quote: I have great faith in fools; self-confidence my friends call it.
author: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: Efficiency is a great secret that can drop us right into our ideal life path, but it is a hard one to practice and something that takes constant maintenance and work.
author: Tara Stiles

quote: The two great risks are risking too much but also risking too little. That's for each person to decide. For me, not risking anything is worse than death. By far.
author: Jimmy Chin

quote: Gardeners are good at nurturing, and they have a great quality of patience, they're tender. They have to be persistent.
author: Ralph Fiennes

quote: Every day is a great day for hockey.
author: Mario Lemieux

quote: Unemployment is a great tragedy. The man who goes about hopelessly seeking work in order to earn bread for his children is a living reproach to civilization.
author: Carlos Saavedra Lamas

quote: All great truths begin as blasphemies.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Do not look down upon any Muslim, for even the most inferior believer is great in the eyes of God.
author: Abu Bakr

author: Tyler Perry

quote: I do like my breasts. They're great, so much fun. You can do what you like with them.
author: Denise Van Outen

quote: I love photography. My boyfriend's got a great camera, which I bought for his birthday.
author: Sarah Sutton

quote: You can't fake this music. You might be a great singer or a great musician but, in the need, that's got nothing to do with it. It's how you connect to the songs and to the history behind them.

quote: Anywhere the struggle is great, the level of ingenuity and inventiveness is high.
author: Eleni Zaude Gabre-Madhin

quote: If the misery of the poor be caused not by the laws of nature, but by our institutions, great is our sin.
author: Charles Darwin

quote: Attachment is the great fabricator of illusions; reality can be attained only by someone who is detached.
author: Simone Weil

quote: You've gotta believe in yourself, and you just have to work harder at it than you've ever worked at anything before in your life. And if you keep doing that and keep believing in yourself, great things do happen.
author: Kate McKinnon

quote: It is humiliating to remain with our hands folded while others write history. It matters little who wins. To make a people great it is necessary to send them to battle even if you have to kick them in the pants. That is what I shall do.
author: Benito Mussolini

quote: Leave your ego at the door every morning, and just do some truly great work. Few things will make you feel better than a job brilliantly done.
author: Robin S. Sharma

quote: All who have accomplished great things have had a great aim, have fixed their gaze on a goal which was high, one which sometimes seemed impossible.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: My father never was and isn't a mean man. You know, he never was ruthless. And he succeeded in life without sticking it to anybody. And that's a great example for a man, a strong man, a man's man, to give to his children. You can succeed, you can be successful, without walking over somebody.
author: Maria Shriver

quote: You need lofty goals. Then cement it with a great work ethic.
author: Jerry West

quote: Forensic science offers great potential, as it draws on almost every discipline and, in doing so, creates widespread opportunity for innovation.
author: Mark Walport

quote: You know, be able to do something great in your life, you're gonna have to realize your failures. You're gonna have to embrace them and figure out how to overcome it.
author: Dave Chappelle

quote: Lesser artists borrow, great artists steal.
author: Igor Stravinsky

quote: You will become as small as your controlling desire; as great as you dominant aspiration.
author: James Allen

quote: Behind every great man there is a suprised woman.
author: Maryon Pearson

quote: Math is the great equalizer. If you can do the numbers, the boys have to respect you.
author: Audrey MacLean

quote: Art is a habit-forming drug. Art has absolutely no existence as veracity, as truth. People always speak of it with this great, religious reverence, but why should it be so revered?
author: Marcel Duchamp

quote: I think if there's a great depression there might be some hope.
author: Lawrence Ferlinghetti

quote: The great marriages are partnerships. It can't be a great marriage without being a partnership.
author: Helen Mirren

quote: But this is the great danger America faces. That we will cease to be one nation and become instead a collection of interest groups: city against suburb, region against region, individual against individual. Each seeking to satisfy private wants.
author: Barbara Jordan

quote: We are all faced with a series of great opportunities - brilliantly disguised as insoluble problems.
author: John W. Gardner

quote: I just wanna learn and I wanna grow. I wanna consume as much information as possible. I wanna be great.
author: Kid Cudi

quote: The aim, if reached or not, makes great the life: Try to be Shakespeare, leave the rest to fate!
author: Robert Browning

quote: Being a great baker and pastry chef requires the upmost open mind. I try every dessert that comes my way!
author: Christina Tosi

quote: Success doesn't happen quickly. It happens from doing the same thing over and over, becoming great at it, and delivering great value to consumers.
author: Kevin Plank

quote: It was some great times and some great moments… I'm proud to be a WWE alumni. If it wasn't for my time there, there's no way I'd be excelling at Fox and acting.
author: Tyrus

quote: I've always been unhappy with my teeth. I've lost most of them from my bottom jaw, and those in the upper jaw have been screwed in or capped. As a result, I've got great hollows under my cheeks, and my bone structure seems accentuated.
author: Kate O'Mara

quote: My greatest point is my persistence. I never give up in a match. However down I am, I fight until the last ball. My list of matches shows that I have turned a great many so-called irretrievable defeats into victories.
author: Bjorn Borg

quote: The first and great commandment is, don't let them scare you.
author: Elmer Davis

quote: I have gone to great lengths, and in some cases beyond what is required by the reporting guidelines to ensure all of my filings are beyond reproach, by hiring an independent third-party accounting firm to review and audit all of my previous annual financial disclosures.
author: Bob Corker

quote: My only fault is that I don't realize how great I really am.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: We are all racing towards death. No matter how many great, intellectual conclusions we draw during our lives, we know they're all only man-made, like God. I begin to wonder where it all leads. What can you do, except do what you can do as best you know how.
author: John Hurt

quote: They missed a great opportunity to shut up.
author: Jacques Chirac

quote: God will not permit any troubles to come upon us, unless He has a specific plan by which great blessing can come out of the difficulty.
author: Peter Marshall

quote: The great liability of the engineer compared to men of other professions is that his works are out in the open where all can see them. His acts, step by step, are in hard substance. He cannot bury his mistakes in the grave like the doctors. He cannot argue them into thin air or blame the judge like the lawyers.
author: Herbert Hoover

quote: My idea of good company is the company of clever, well-informed people who have a great deal of conversation; that is what I call good company.
author: Jane Austen

quote: There is a great stir about colored men getting their rights, but not a word about the colored women; and if colored men get their rights, and not colored women theirs, you see, the colored men will be masters over the women, and it will be just as bad as it was before.
author: Sojourner Truth

quote: Do you want to be safe and good, or do you want to take a chance and be great?
author: Jimmy Johnson

quote: I've had the privilege of working with Bono for the past few years in the One Campaign to fight AIDS and hunger and disease around the world. Bono is an Irishman and a great humanitarian. And I remember him telling me of his admiration for America.
author: Mike Huckabee

quote: All great artists draw from the same resource: the human heart, which tells us that we are all more alike than we are unalike.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Great things come out of being hungry and cold. Once you're pampered, you get lazy.
author: Rob Zombie

quote: The Roaring Twenties were the period of that Great American Prosperity which was built on shaky foundations.
author: J. Paul Getty

quote: Great tranquility of heart is his who cares for neither praise nor blame.
author: Thomas a Kempis

quote: The best moderators are the moderators who are essentially invisible. A moderator who is there to be seen and heard and to be talked about either, 'oh, God, what a great question,' or, 'oh, God, what a lousy question,' that to me is a failed moderator.
author: Jim Lehrer

quote: Each person has inside a basic decency and goodness. If he listens to it and acts on it, he is giving a great deal of what it is the world needs most. It is not complicated but it takes courage. It takes courage for a person to listen to his own goodness and act on it.
author: Pablo Casals

quote: Sports are such a great teacher. I think of everything they've taught me: camaraderie, humility, how to resolve differences.
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: I find that the prejudice in this country to color is very great, and I sometimes fear that it is on the increase.
author: Hiram Rhodes Revels

quote: Synergy is what happens when one plus one equals ten or a hundred or even a thousand! It's the profound result when two or more respectful human beings determine to go beyond their preconceived ideas to meet a great challenge.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: A great man is one who leaves others at a loss after he is gone.
author: Paul Valery

quote: Great lives never go out; they go on.
author: Benjamin Harrison

quote: More than anything, I like a jacket. You can do anything with a great jacket, the bigger the better. You can have any silhouette underneath. It gives you an attitude. It makes a gown look cool.
author: Rihanna

quote: Never quit believing that you can develop in life. Never give up. Don't deny the inward spirit that provides the drive to accomplish great things in life.
author: Jon Huntsman, Sr.

quote: My scientific studies have afforded me great gratification; and I am convinced that it will not be long before the whole world acknowledges the results of my work.
author: Gregor Mendel

quote: Good leaders organize and align people around what the team needs to do. Great leaders motivate and inspire people with why they're doing it. That's purpose. And that's the key to achieving something truly transformational.
author: Marillyn Hewson

quote: The woman power of this nation can be the power which makes us whole and heals the rotten community, now so shattered by war and poverty and racism. I have great faith in the power of women who will dedicate themselves whole-heartedly to the task of remaking our society.
author: Coretta Scott King

quote: Sports is a metaphor for overcoming obstacles and achieving against great odds. Athletes, in times of difficulty, can be important role models.
author: Bill Bradley

quote: I had an amazing experience working with great people. I had a great family, a typical family with drama in certain areas, and that's pretty much everywhere in everyone's life.
author: Tina Yothers

quote: My view is that Trump will not change the Republican Party, America's right-of-center party. If he brings in new followers, that's great, and well worth the effort, but he will not change the Republican Party.
author: Mitch McConnell

quote: Eating is not merely a material pleasure. Eating well gives a spectacular joy to life and contributes immensely to goodwill and happy companionship. It is of great importance to the morale.
author: Elsa Schiaparelli

quote: Science is the great antidote to the poison of enthusiasm and superstition.
author: Adam Smith

quote: Simplicity, clarity, singleness: These are the attributes that give our lives power and vividness and joy as they are also the marks of great art. They seem to be the purpose of God for his whole creation.
author: Richard Holloway

quote: No great artist ever sees things as they really are. If he did, he would cease to be an artist.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: A happy life must be to a great extent a quiet life, for it is only in an atmosphere of quiet that true joy dare live.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: You don't concentrate on risks. You concentrate on results. No risk is too great to prevent the necessary job from getting done.
author: Chuck Yeager

quote: When I read great literature, great drama, speeches, or sermons, I feel that the human mind has not achieved anything greater than the ability to share feelings and thoughts through language.
author: James Earl Jones

quote: Genius begins great works; labor alone finishes them.
author: Joseph Joubert

quote: One of the easiest things to incorporate into your everyday life is plank exercises: great for your core, great for your lower back.
author: David Kirsch

quote: Death will be a great relief. No more interviews.
author: Katharine Hepburn

quote: Sunsets are great. Sunrises are a mixed bag. You either got up way too early or went to bed way too late.
author: Matt Dillon

quote: That seems to me the great American danger we're all in, that we'll bargain away the experience of being alive for the appearance of it.
author: Mike Nichols

quote: Good writers borrow from other writers. Great writers steal from them outright.
author: Aaron Sorkin

quote: A great truth is a truth whose opposite is also a truth.
author: Thomas Mann

quote: Are you the person who just wakes up, puts your T-shirt on and runs out of the house? Or do you wake up an hour early - get your mental notes together, fix you a little coffee... prepare yourself for the day and try to do something really great? It begins with you.
author: Rick Ross

quote: There is nothing better than getting shot at and missed. It's really great.
author: Jim Mattis

quote: The conscious mind may be compared to a fountain playing in the sun and falling back into the great subterranean pool of subconscious from which it rises.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: There was never a great man who had not a great mother.
author: Olive Schreiner

quote: The further you get away from yourself, the more challenging it is. Not to be in your comfort zone is great fun.
author: Benedict Cumberbatch

quote: A great deal of creativity is about pattern recognition, and what you need to discern patterns is tons of data. Your mind collects that data by taking note of random details and anomalies easily seen every day: quirks and changes that, eventually, add up to insights.
author: Margaret Heffernan

quote: If I were not able to separate the art from the artists, I think I would limit myself a great deal, and life wouldn't be nearly as interesting.
author: Jessye Norman

quote: At the heart of great leadership is a curious mind, heart, and spirit.
author: Chip Conley

quote: Education is not merely neglected in many of our schools today, but is replaced to a great extent by ideological indoctrination.
author: Thomas Sowell

quote: Suffering is one of life's great teachers.
author: Bryant H. McGill

quote: When I was 20, I thought I was 30 - but I was so far from it. When you're young, you want everything to happen now. As you mature, you can look back and see all the great things you achieved with time and patience.
author: Elisha Cuthbert

quote: Great discoveries and improvements invariably involve the cooperation of many minds. I may be given credit for having blazed the trail, but when I look at the subsequent developments I feel the credit is due to others rather than to myself.
author: Alexander Graham Bell

quote: An out-and-out fast bowler is one of the great sights in cricket.
author: James Anderson

quote: The whole idea of a stereotype is to simplify. Instead of going through the problem of all this great diversity - that it's this or maybe that - you have just one large statement; it is this.
author: Chinua Achebe

quote: Strong convictions precede great actions.
author: James Freeman Clarke

quote: I think that any time of great pain is a time of transformation, a fertile time to plant new seeds.
author: Debbie Ford

quote: People are always going to go shopping. A lot of our effort is just: 'How do we make the retail experience a great one?'
author: Philip Green

quote: True greatness consists in being great in little things.
author: Charles Simmons

quote: There is a gigantic difference between earning a great deal of money and being rich.
author: Marlene Dietrich

quote: I'm into very colorful food. Obviously lots of flavor, but I think we eat with our eyes first, so it has to look great. The presentation has to be great.
author: Giada De Laurentiis

quote: Our knowledge is a little island in a great ocean of nonknowledge.
author: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quote: All great art is born of the metropolis.
author: Ezra Pound

quote: Our government is deeply disordered; its credit is impaired; its debt increasing; its expenditures extravagant and wasteful; its disbursements without efficient accountability; and its taxes (for duties are but taxes) enormous, unequal, and oppressive to the great producing classes of the country.
author: John C. Calhoun

quote: A good dancer is not necessarily defined by great technique, skill, or ability to pick up choreography but by confidence. When you feel the music, it penetrates to your soul. Everybody's a dancer. The greatest dancer is someone who is willing to dance, not afraid.
author: Alyssa Edwards

quote: I can only say thank you and thanks also to all of the great songwriters who wrote those wonderful songs that became number ones.
author: George Strait

quote: 'Crazy-busy' is a great armor, it's a great way for numbing. What a lot of us do is that we stay so busy, and so out in front of our life, that the truth of how we're feeling and what we really need can't catch up with us.
author: Brene Brown

quote: London, that great cesspool into which all the loungers and idlers of the Empire are irresistibly drained.
author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quote: And some places you been before are so great that you don't ever mind going back. Some places you been before you don't ever want to go back, you know, like Montreal in the Winter.

quote: Silence is a source of great strength.

quote: The last great delusion is soon to open before us. Antichrist is to perform his marvelous works in our sight So closely will the counterfeit resemble the true that it will be impossible to distinguish between them except by the Holy Scriptures.

quote: Put on a sweater and really great sneakers with a big scarf, and you'll look so stylish. For me, they are an everyday essential.

quote: Miami is one of these great places that is a really sensual, physically beautiful place.

quote: There's a great deal of mystery in film editing, and that's because you're not supposed to see a lot of it. You're supposed to feel that a film has pace and rhythm and drama, but you're not necessarily supposed to be worried about how that was accomplished.

quote: Love is the great miracle cure. Loving ourselves works miracles in our lives.

quote: Brexit stops Britain from being Great Britain.

quote: Every chef I know, their cholesterol is through the roof. And mine's not so great.

quote: It's a great time to be alive.

author: Liza Soberano

author: Anne Lamott

quote: I used to think that one of the great signs of security was the ability to just walk away.

quote: The rage for railroads is so great that many will be laid in parts where they will not pay.

quote: There is a woman at the beginning of all great things.

quote: Great heroes need great sorrows and burdens, or half their greatness goes unnoticed.
author: Peter S. Beagle

quote: A great age of literature is perhaps always a great age of translations.
author: Ezra Pound

quote: If you want to achieve something great, you have to work hard for it. It is as simple as that.

quote: You want to give me chocolate and flowers? That would be great. I love them both. I just don't want them out of guilt, and I don't want them if you're not going to give them to all the people who helped mother our children.
author: Anne Lamott

quote: Love and magic have a great deal in common. They enrich the soul, delight the heart. And they both take practice.
author: Nora Roberts

quote: Celebrity is a word I take great umbrage with. I'm actively anti-celebrity.

quote: Our great power does not mean we can do whatever we want whenever we want, nor should we assume we have all the wisdom and knowledge necessary to succeed.

quote: When you want something so bad and when something great happens, I think it's instinct that you say, 'This is gonna be the moment that's gonna change everything. Everybody is gonna see me a different way.'

quote: That's the great thing about being a teenager. You think you're a genius.

quote: India is a country in which every great religion finds a home.

quote: When people say England, they sometimes mean Great Britain, sometimes the United Kingdom, sometimes the British Isles, - but never England.

quote: Complexity is one of the great problems in environmental design.

quote: Money is the great tool through whose means labor and skill become universally co-operative.
author: Leland Stanford

quote: I don't think it's a coincidence that 'The War Room' and 'A Perfect Candidate' are films that have been consistently shown and available for rental for 20 years. author: R. J. Cutler

quote: I'm an Amazon Prime member. I subscribe to Netflix and Hulu, and they have great user interfaces and some excellent original programs. author: John Landgraf

quote: All great works of literature either dissolve a genre or invent one.

quote: I just love a great groove.

quote: To love one that is great, is almost to be great one's self.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: Let us go forward in this battle fortified by conviction that those who labour in the service of a great and good cause will never fail.
author: Owen Arthur

quote: Great political leaders risk unpopularity, patiently explain their case and confront prejudice, bigotry and vested interests.
author: Ann Widdecombe

quote: A face is a road map of someone's life. Without any need to amplify that or draw attention to it, there's a great deal that's communicated about who this person is and what their life experiences have been.

quote: It's great that people get together and collaborate, talk about the facts and the analysis, all in the interest of having a great financial system.
author: Jamie Dimon

quote: What would we be without the fans? They're more important than me, because they make our sport great; they make things happen. We put on the show, but if people don't react to it, we are nothing. So, the fans, basically we should roll out the red carpet for them.

quote: When distant and unfamiliar and complex things are communicated to great masses of people, the truth suffers a considerable and often a radical distortion. The complex is made over into the simple, the hypothetical into the dogmatic, and the relative into an absolute.
author: Walter Lippmann

quote: If I have the opportunity, a massage or facial is a great way to take a little 'me time.'

quote: With great power comes great responsibility. These are platforms with hundreds of millions of people.

quote: You take a crash, you get back up and next time you succeed and that's a great feeling.

quote: It is too great comfort which turns a man against himself. Life is most readily renounced at the time and among the classes where it is least harsh.
author: Emile Durkheim

quote: Racism may be as systemic as it always was. It is the great problem of America. It's the one stumbling block that I don't believe was ever smoothed over.

quote: Speed isn't everything, but he'd be a great striker at Atletico. Usain Bolt would be perfect for our game. Me behind and him up front. The best!

quote: How does a pansy, for example, select the ingredients from soil to get the right colors for the flower? Now there's a great miracle. I think there's a supreme power behind all of this. I see it in nature.

quote: Having great friends in New York is like having great friends on an expedition into Darkest Africa in the early 19th century. You need them. And you need sponsorship on a daily basis. quote: A superhero movie is only as great as its villains.
author: Chadwick Boseman

quote: A steak needs fat to taste great.
author: Tom Colicchio

quote: You have to believe in yourself. You need to have the audacity to be great.
author: Rosie Perez

quote: I've had a great ride. I've got no complaints.
author: Larry King

quote: I think the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame, first of all, has got to be put into the context of being an American cultural showcase. It's there to be a museum showcase of all that's great about American music.
author: Ian Anderson

quote: On both sides of my family, my grandparents grew up in total poverty and came to California during the Great Depression. The only way they were able to work their way out of that was by joining the military, which is how they both went on to be able to go to college.
author: Katie Hill

quote: There is a great power in speaking your truth and standing for something important.
author: Sonita Alizadeh

quote: It's a great gift to be able to make people laugh.
author: Brahmanandam

quote: You definitely need to have red lipstick no matter what. You can have a great outfit, but it will always give you that extra little pop. I also love perfume. It doesn't even matter what the perfume is. I like to smell sweet.
author: Jillian Hervey

quote: For my part, I am not a great believer in bad luck on the cricket field, in business - in fact, in any walk of life.
author: AB de Villiers

quote: The danger to society is not merely that it should believe wrong things, though that is great enough; but that it should become credulous, and lose the habit of testing things and inquiring into them; for then it must sink back into savagery.
author: William Kingdon Clifford

quote: Private philanthropy is the direct expression of the great Christian principle of the brotherhood of man and the Golden Rule. Private philanthropy indeed is the only valid expression of these ethical principles; compulsory charity through 'social legislation' is the exact contrary: it is the evil imposition of force by one group on another.
author: Murray Rothbard

quote: I feel to invite women everywhere to rise to the great potential within you. I do not ask that you reach beyond your capacity. I hope you will not nag yourselves with thoughts of failure. I hope you will not try to set goals far beyond your capacity to achieve. I hope you will simply do what you can do in the best way you know.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: Great companies are built in the office, with hard work put in by a team.
author: Emily Chang

quote: It's great to win, regardless of how you did it.
author: John Stockton

quote: I love walking on a treadmill, it's a great way to challenge yourself!
author: Denise Austin

quote: Tom Brady is a great quarterback, he's a great player, and what you've seen with him is he's gotten better every year.
author: Eli Manning

quote: Have the courage to be ignorant of a great number of things, in order to avoid the calamity of being ignorant of everything.
author: Sydney Smith

quote: The library of my elementary school had this great biography section, and I read all of these paperback biographies until they were dog-eared. The story of Eleanor Roosevelt and Madame Curie and Martin Luther King and George Washington Carver and on and on and on.
author: Christine Quinn

quote: It's a great time to be doing political satire when the world is on a knife edge.
author: John Oliver

quote: The roll out of a new car is always filled with great anticipation; it's almost like going back to school for a new school year.
author: Christian Horner

quote: Scarves, mittens, and hats are a great way to express your personality in the cold weather.
author: Brad Goreski

quote: I just banged it a little bit on a helmet. And you know, if you get your throwing motion and momentum going at a helmet it makes it hurt a little more and it freaks everybody out because it's your throwing shoulder, but honestly, it feels great.
author: Mark Sanchez

quote: I want to go where I'm the difference. I want to make something out of nothing. I want to be the reason someone is great.
author: Dak Prescott

quote: I know to win a championship, you're not going to do it alone. You're going to have to have a great supporting cast.
author: Klay Thompson
